    "/vehicles/{vin}/usercapabilities": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "User Vehicle Capabilities",
        "description": "Returns the list of available Vehicle Capabilities which a given user can perform on a given VIN. It requires the consented scope `vin`.\nVersions 1&2 return VCF internal calculation for user capabilities. Version 3 collects the user capabilities from VDBS.\n",
        "operationId": "getUserCapabilities",
        "tags": [
          "Capabilities"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "required": true,
            "description": "A valid VIN",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "name": "id",
            "in": "query",
            "required": false,
            "description": "Filter out other capabilities. When not set, will default to returning all available capabilities.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "example": "climatisation,charging"
            }
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "List of User Vehicle Capabilities",
            "headers": {
              "VCF-Trace-ID": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "description": "Identifier for the transaction triggered by the request"
              }
            },
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=3": {
                "schema": {
                  "properties": {
                    "data": {
                      "type": "array",
                      "items": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "required": [
                          "id",
                          "status"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "A unique identifier for the capability",
                            "example": "vehiclehealth_v1"
                          },
                          "status": {
                            "description": "A list of status codes for the capability",
                            "type": "array",
                            "items": {
                              "description": "| Code | Description  |\n|------|--------------|\n| 1001 | ServiceStatusDeactivated |\n| 1003 | ServiceStatusInitiallyDisabled |\n| 1004 | ServiceStatusSwitchedOff |\n| 1005 | ServiceStatusPrivacyMode |\n| 1006 | ServiceStatusWorkshopMode |\n| 1007 | ServiceStatusMissingOperation |\n| 1008 | ServiceStatusMissingService |\n| 1009 | ServiceStatusInsufficientBatteryLevel |\n| 1010 | ServiceStatusServiceStatusPowerBudgetReached |\n| 1011 | ServiceStatusDeepSleep |\n| 1013 | ServiceStatusLocationDataDisabled |\n| 1014 | ServiceStatusVehicleDisabled |\n| 1015 | ServiceStatusProductDisabledForVehicle |\n| 2001 | ServiceStatusLicenseInactive |\n| 2002 | ServiceStatusLicenseExpired |\n| 3001 | ServiceStatusUserNotVerified |\n| 3002 | ServiceStatusTAndCNotAccepted |\n| 3003 | ServiceStatusInsufficientRights |\n| 3005 | ServiceStatusDeactivatedByActiveVehicleUser |\n| 5001 | ServiceStatusUpstreamServiceFail |\n",
                              "type": "integer"
                            },
                            "example": [
                              1000
                            ]
                          },
                          "expirationDate": {
                            "description": "End of usage for the service either since it will reach end of\nlifetime or the current associated license will expire, null if\nit never expires\n",
                            "type": "string",
                            "example": "2020-12-04T06:00:00Z"
                          },
                          "userDisablingAllowed": {
                            "description": "Indicates whether a service can be disabled by the user.\n",
                            "type": "boolean",
                            "example": false
                          }
                        }
                      },
                      "example": [
                        {
                          "id": "access",
                          "status": [],
                          "expirationDate": "2020-12-04T06:00:00Z",
                          "userDisablingAllowed": false
                        },
                        {

                    "example": 1015,

                    "enum": [
                      1004,
                      1015

      "get": {
        "description": "Returns the charging statistics of the car. It requires the consented scope `manageCharging` and the capability `smartChargingStatistics` to be available and enabled.",
        "summary": "Charging Statistics History",
        "tags": [
          "Charging"
        ],
        "operationId": "getChargingStatisticsHistory",
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "description": "A valid VIN",
            "required": true,
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "name": "from",
            "in": "query",
            "description": "show history from that point of time.",
            "required": false,
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "example": "2017-09-07T14:33:58.010Z"
            }
          },
          {
            "name": "to",
            "in": "query",
            "description": "show history until that point of time.",
            "required": false,
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "example": "2017-09-07T14:33:58.010Z"
            }
          },
          {
            "name": "page",
            "in": "query",
            "description": "zero-based page index",
            "required": false,
            "schema": {
              "type": "integer"
            }
          },
          {
            "name": "size",
            "in": "query",
            "description": "the size of the page to be returned",
            "required": false,
            "schema": {
              "type": "integer"
            }
          },
          {
            "name": "sort",
            "in": "query",
            "description": "Sorting criteria in the format. Default sort order is ascending.",
            "required": false,
            "example": "asc",

        ],
        "operationId": "getChargingStatus",

            "in": "header",

              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "The charging status of the car",

              }

                          "properties": {

                              "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                            },
                            "currentSOC_pct": {

                              "example": 5
                            },
                            "navigationTargetSOC_pct": {
                              "description": "The required percentage of the car's charge level, in order to proceed to the next destination of an active journey.\n",
                              "type": "integer",
                              "nullable": true,
                              "example": 60
                            },
                            "chargeEnergy_kWh": {
                              "description": "The energy in kWh that the battery can deliver based on the current SOC. Range is between 0 and 1000kWh.\n",
                              "type": "number",
                              "nullable": true,
                              "example": 6.5
                            },
                            "cruisingRangeElectric_km": {
                              "description": "Remaining cruising range with HV battery power. In enriched charging notifications this value might be missing.\n",
                              "type": "integer",
                              "example": 200
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "chargingStatus": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "properties": {
                            "carCapturedTimestamp": {
                              "description": "Timestamp when the data regarding charging status was read last and sent by the car. Timestamp will be formatted as RFC3339.\n",

                              "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                            },
                            "remainingChargingTimeToComplete_min": {
                              "nullable": true,
                              "description": "Estimated remaining charging time until the SOC is reached, which was explicitly specified with a\ntarget SOC parameter of a 'Start charging' request or a charging profile.\n",
                              "type": "integer",
                              "example": 60
                            },
                            "chargingState": {
                              "description": "State of charging process\n\nPossible values:\n* `charging` - A charging process is ongoing\n* `conservation` - Charging with low currentflow to maintain SOC of HV battery\n* `notReadyForCharging` - The car is not ready for charging. StartCharging preconditions are not met or missing the precontions.\n* `readyForCharging` - The car is ready for charging. StartCharging preconditions are OK. (plugConnectionState=connected, plugLockState=locked)\n* `chargePurposeReachedAndNotConservationCharging` - Charging purpose is reached (targetSOC_pct) without conservation.\n* `chargePurposeReachedAndConservation` - Charging purpose is reached (targetSOC_pct) and conservation (Charging-> battery lose energy | Not charging-> battery doesn´t lose energy). The SOC should not change.\n* `discharging` - The HV battery is currently discharging.\n* `invalid` - Invalid data, no charging state available\n* `error` - The device backend sends this error, when it doesn't know the charge state/ unknown state/ invalid state. For example: device backend has lost the IP commnication with the car.\n* `off` - No ongoing charging process\n* `unsupported` - Vehicle does not support this information\n",
                              "type": "string",
                              "example": "off"
                            },
                            "chargePower_kW": {
                              "description": "The charge power to the HV battery in kW. Range between 0 and 500 kW.\n",
                              "type": "number",
                              "example": 567.8,
                              "nullable": true
                            },

                              "description": "Range increase per time unit during ongoing charging process based on the average energy comsumption\nfor driving. Unit is km (range increase) per hour (charging time). Range between 0 and 3000.\n",

                              "example": 123.4,
                              "nullable": true
                            },

                              "type": "string",
                              "example": "ac"
                            },
                            "chargeMode": {

                              "type": "string",
                              "example": "timer"
                            },

    "/vehicles/{vin}/charging/settings": {
      "get": {
        "description": "Returns the latest charging settings of the car. It requires the consented scope `charging` and the capability `charging` to be available and enabled.",
        "summary": "Charging Settings",
        "tags": [
          "Charging"
        ],
        "operationId": "getChargingSettings",
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "description": "A valid VIN",
            "required": true,
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "The charging settings of the car",
            "headers": {
              "VCF-Trace-ID": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "description": "Identifier for the transaction triggered by the request"
              }
            },
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=2": {
                "schema": {
                  "properties": {
                    "data": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "maxChargeCurrentAC": {
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "Possible values:\n* `maximum`\n* `reduced`\n* `invalid`\n",
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "maximum"
                        },
                        "maxChargeCurrentAC_A": {
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "charging current in ampere",
                          "type": "integer",
                          "format": "int32",
                          "example": 100
                        },
                        "carCapturedTimestamp": {
                          "description": "Timestamp when the data regarding charging setttings was read last and sent by the car. Timestamp will be formatted as RFC3339.\n",
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                        },
                        "autoUnlockPlugWhenChargedAC": {
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "Possible values:\n* `permanent`\n* `once`\n* `off`\n* `invalid`\n",
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "permanent"
                        },
                        "autoUnlockPlugWhenChargedDC": {
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "Possible values:\n* `permanent`\n* `once`\n* `off`\n* `invalid`\n",
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "off"
                        },
                        "targetSOC_pct": {
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "Targeted state of of charge in percent (MOD4 only, for AUDI also MOD3 with RPT)\n",
                          "type": "number",
                          "example": 42

      "put": {
        "description": "Sets the charging settings of the car. It requires the consented scope `manageCharging` and the capability `charging` to be available and enabled.",
        "summary": "Charging Settings",
        "tags": [
          "Charging"
        ],
        "operationId": "setChargingSettings",
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "description": "A valid VIN",
            "required": true,
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "requestBody": {
          "required": true,
          "content": {
            "application/json;version=2": {
              "schema": {
                "required": [
                  "callback"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "callback": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Callback URL for VCF to provide the status of a charging action request. Needs to be a valid URL."
                  },
                  "maxChargeCurrentAC": {
                    "nullable": true,
                    "description": "Possible values:\n* `maximum`\n* `reduced`\n",
                    "type": "string",
                    "example": "maximum"
                  },
                  "maxChargeCurrentAC_A": {
                    "nullable": true,
                    "description": "charging current in ampere",
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int32",
                    "example": 100
                  },
                  "autoUnlockPlugWhenChargedAC": {
                    "nullable": true,
                    "description": "Possible values:\n* `permanent` (Only allowed when VDBS parameter *allowPlugUnlockACPermanent* in capability *charging*  is set to true) \n* `once` (Only allowed when VDBS parameter *allowPlugUnlockACOnce* in capability *charging* is set to true)\n* `off`\n* `invalid`\n",
                    "type": "string",
                    "example": "permanent"
                  },
                  "autoUnlockPlugWhenChargedDC": {
                    "nullable": true,
                    "description": "Possible values:\n* `permanent` (Only allowed when VDBS parameter *allowPlugUnlockDCPermanent* in capability *charging*  is set to true)\n* `once` (Only allowed when VDBS parameter *allowPlugUnlockDCOnce* in capability *charging* is set to true)\n* `off`\n* `invalid`\n",
                    "type": "string",
                    "example": "off"
                  },
                  "targetSOC_pct": {
                    "nullable": true,
                    "description": "Targeted state of of charge in percent. Only settable when VDBS parameter *supportsTargetStateOfCharge* in capability *charging* is set to true. (MOD4 only, for AUDI also MOD3 with RPT)\n",
                    "type": "number",
                    "example": 42
                  }
                }
              }
            },
            "application/json;version=1": {
              "schema": {
                "required": [
                  "callback"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "callback": {
                    "type": "string",

                "description": "Identifier for the transaction triggered by the request"
              }
            },
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "code": {
                      "description": "For further information about the meaning of the error codes please check the [Error Codes](#tag/Error-Codes) section",
                      "type": "integer",
                      "format": "int32",
                      "example": 4004
                    },
                    "message": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "example": "The performed call cannot be executed due to missing user consent"
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }

        ],

          },

            "in": "header",

            "required": true

          "required": true,

                  "callback",
                  "batteryCareMode"
                ],

                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Callback URL for VCF to provide the status of a charging action request. Needs to be a valid URL."
                  },

                    "description": "Possible values:\n* `activated`\n* `deactivated`\n",

      "get": {
        "description": "Returns the latest charging settings mode of the car. It requires the consented scope `charging` and the capability `charging` to be available and enabled.",
        "summary": "Charging Mode",
        "tags": [
          "Charging"
        ],
        "operationId": "getChargingMode",
        "parameters": [
          {

              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "The charging mode of the car",
            "headers": {
              "VCF-Trace-ID": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "description": "Identifier for the transaction triggered by the request"
              }
            },
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "properties": {
                    "data": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "preferredChargeMode": {
                          "description": "Possible values:\n* `manual` - Charge mode set for immediate charging\n* `timer` - Charge mode set by timer\n* `timerChargingWithClimatisation` - Vehicle uses timer charging in conjunction with climatisation\n* `preferredChargingTimes` - Vehicle charges within preferred charging times\n* `onlyOwnCurrent` - Solar charging with Home Energy Management System (HEMS)\n* `immediateDischarging` - Bi-Directional DC Charging - vehicle discharges own battery to provide energy to home storage\n* `homeStorageCharging` - Bi-Directional DC Charging - vehicle offers own battery to provide either energy to home storage or store energy surplus\n* `invalid`\n",
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "timer"
                        },
                        "availableChargeModes": {
                          "type": "array",
                          "description": "Possible values:\n* `manual` - Charge mode set for immediate charging\n* `timer` - Charge mode set by timer\n* `timerChargingWithClimatisation` - Vehicle uses timer charging in conjunction with climatisation\n* `preferredChargingTimes` - Vehicle charges within preferred charging times\n* `onlyOwnCurrent` - Solar charging with Home Energy Management System (HEMS)\n* `immediateDischarging` - Bi-Directional DC Charging - vehicle discharges own battery to provide energy to home storage\n* `homeStorageCharging` - Bi-Directional DC Charging - vehicle offers own battery to provide either energy to home storage or store energy surplus\n* `invalid`\n",

                    "message": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "example": "The performed call is unauthorized"
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          },
          "403": {
            "description": "Forbidden",
            "headers": {
              "VCF-Trace-ID": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "description": "Identifier for the transaction triggered by the request"
              }
            },
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",

                    "code": {

                      "format": "int32",
                      "example": 4004
                    },

                      "type": "string",

    "/vehicles/{vin}/charging/start": {
      "post": {
        "description": "Starts the charging of the car. It requires the consented scope `manageCharging` and the capability `charging` to be available and enabled.",
        "summary": "Start Charging",
        "tags": [
          "Charging"
        ],
        "operationId": "startCharging",
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "description": "A valid VIN",
            "required": true,
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "requestBody": {
          "required": true,
          "content": {
            "application/json;version=1": {
              "schema": {
                "required": [
                  "callback"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "callback": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "a callback URL for VCF to provide the status of a charging action request. Needs to be a valid URL."
                  },
                  "maxChargeCurrentAC": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Value that should be used when start charging, translates to amperes. (MOD3 only). Defaults to empty string."
                  }
                },
                "example": {
                  "callback": "https://example.com/mycallback",
                  "maxChargeCurrentAC": "reduced | maximum"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Start Charging Response",

                  "type": "string"
                },

                  "type": "string"
                },
                "description": "Number of available requests"
              }
            },

    "/vehicles/{vin}/charging/profiles": {
      "get": {
        "description": "Returns the charging profiles of the car. It requires the consented scope `charging` and the capability `chargingProfiles` to be available and enabled. \n\nFor AUDI the `timers` array will always be empty. They are available at [GET /charging/timers](#operation/getChargingTimers).\n",
        "summary": "Charging Profiles",
        "tags": [
          "Charging"
        ],
        "operationId": "getChargingProfiles",
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "description": "A valid VIN",
            "required": true,
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "The charging profiles of the car",
            "headers": {
              "VCF-Trace-ID": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "description": "Identifier for the transaction triggered by the request"
              }
            },
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "properties": {
                    "data": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "carCapturedTimestamp": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00Z",
                          "description": "Timestamp when the data was read last and sent by the car. Timestamp will be formatted as RFC3339.\n"
                        },
                        "timeInCar": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "2019-01-01T02:00:00+02:00",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "Time the user set in the car. This includes the timezone:\n* UTC: `2019-01-01T00:00:00Z`\n* Europe/Berlin: `2019-01-01T02:00:00+02:00`\n"
                        },
                        "vehiclePositionedInProfileID": {
                          "type": "number",
                          "description": "ID of the profile, to which the vehicle is positioned. Only supported by vehicle when VDBS parameter *supportsVehiclePositionedInProfileID* in capability *chargingProfiles* is set to true. Only for AUDI MOD3 with RPT and MOD4.",
                          "example": 1,
                          "nullable": true
                        },
                        "nextChargingTimer": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "description": "Only for MOD4",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "properties": {
                            "id": {
                              "type": "number",
                              "description": "id of the next charging timer.",
                              "example": 1
                            },
                            "targetSOCreachable": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "Whether the `targetSOC` is reachable or not.\n\nPossible values:\n* `calculating` - Calculation of reachability of the target(eg. target_soc).\n* `reachable` - Desired charging level is reachable.\n* `notReachable` - Desired charging level is not reachable.\n* `invalid` - The value is Invalid/Unknown or not available.\n",
                              "example": "reachable"
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "profiles": {
                          "type": "array",
                          "description": "Number of possible profiles reflected in VDBS parameter *numberOfProfiles* in capability *chargingProfiles*.",
                          "items": {
                            "properties": {
                              "id": {
                                "type": "number",
                                "example": 2
                              },
                              "uuid": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "example": "26e0cebc-cdb0-476d-9a6b-3b02a13a74f8",
                                "nullable": true,
                                "description": "Only for MOD4 and PPE"
                              },
                              "name": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The name of the charging profile as specified by the user.",
                                "example": "Profile 1"
                              },
                              "profileType": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "nullable": true,
                                "description": "The type of the charging profile provided by the device platform (Only for PPE). \n* `locationIndependent` - Profile is a default profile not connected to a specific position for Audi and a regular profile for Porsche\n* `locationBased` - Regular profile connected to a position.\n* `navigationBased` - Profile is connected to the navigation feature.\n* `invalid` - The value is Invalid/Unknown or not available.\n",
                                "example": "locationIndependent"
                              },
                              "maxChargingCurrent": {
                                "nullable": true,
                                "description": "Possible values:\n* `max`\n* `reduced`\n* `invalid`\n",
                                "type": "string"
                              },
                              "postalAddress": {
                                "nullable": true,
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "Address of the charging location. (PPE-vehicles only)"
                              },
                              "minSOC_pct": {
                                "type": "number",
                                "description": "Minimum charging level set by the user. Defined as a percentage.",
                                "example": 50
                              },
                              "minSOC_enabled": {
                                "type": "boolean",
                                "description": "Shows if min SOC is enabled (Only for AUDI MOD3 with RPT)",
                                "example": true,
                                "nullable": true
                              },
                              "position": {
                                "type": "object",
                                "nullable": true,

                                "properties": {
                                  "lat": {
                                    "type": "number",

                                  },
                                  "lon": {
                                    "type": "number",
                                    "description": "Longitude"
                                  },

                                    "type": "number",

                                    "nullable": true
                                  },

                                    "type": "number",
                                    "description": "Radius in m",
                                    "nullable": true
                                  }
                                }
                              },
                              "targetSOC_pct": {
                                "type": "number",
                                "nullable": true,

                                "example": 50
                              },
                              "options": {
                                "type": "object",
                                "properties": {

                                    "description": "Possible values:\n* `off`\n* `permanent`\n* `once`\n* `invalid`\n* `unsupported`\n",
                                    "type": "string"
                                  },

                                    "description": "Indicates if the profile is configured to charge during preferred time periods.\n",

                                    "nullable": true,
                                    "example": true
                                  },

                                  },

                              "preferredChargingTimes": {
                                "type": "array",
                                "description": "Number of settable preferred charging times reflected by VDBS parameter *numberOfPreferredChargingTimes* in capability *chargingProfiles*.",

                                    "id": {
                                      "type": "number",
                                      "description": "The unique identifier of this preferred charging time.",
                                      "example": 1
                                    },
                                    "enabled": {
                                      "type": "boolean",
                                      "description": "Indicates if this preferred charging time should be used for charging optimization or not."
                                    },
                                    "startTime": {
                                      "type": "string",
                                      "nullable": true,

                                    },
                                    "startTimeLocal": {

                                      "nullable": true,

                                    },

                                      "type": "string",
                                      "nullable": true,
                                      "description": "Specifies when the preferred charging time should stop. Please be aware that this time should be in local time."
                                    }
                                  }
                                }
                              },
                              "timers": {
                                "type": "array",
                                "description": "Number of settable timers reflected by VDBS parameter *numberOfTimers* in capability *chargingProfiles*. VDBS parameter *timeZoneReference* in capability *chargingProfiles* determines if UTC or local timestamps can be used for setting of timers.",
                                "items": {
                                  "type": "object",
                                  "properties": {
                                    "id": {
                                      "type": "number",
                                      "description": "The unique identifier of this preferred charging timer."
                                    },
                                    "climatisation": {
                                      "type": "boolean",
                                      "description": "Indicates if the climatisation should start (or not start), once the charging process is completed."
                                    },
                                    "enabled": {
                                      "type": "boolean",
                                      "description": "Indicates if this preferred charging time should be used for charging optimization or not. Enabling of several timers allowed when VDBS parameter *multipleActiveTimersAllowed* in capability *chargingTimers* is set to true."

                                      "type": "object",
                                      "description": "Recurring Timers only supported when VDBS parameter *supportsRepeatingTimer* in capability *chargingTimers* is set to true.",

                                          "type": "string",
                                          "nullable": true,
                                          "example": "15:04",

                                        },
                                        "startTimeLocal": {
                                          "type": "string",
                                          "nullable": true,
                                          "example": "15:04",

                                        },
                                        "recurringOn": {
                                          "type": "object",
                                          "properties": {
                                            "mondays": {
                                              "type": "boolean",
                                              "description": "Indicates a day of the week, and is mandatory when recurring is set to true."
                                            },
                                            "tuesdays": {
                                              "type": "boolean",
                                              "description": "Indicates a day of the week, and is mandatory when recurring is set to true."
                                            },

                                              "type": "boolean",

                                            },

                                              "type": "boolean",

                                            },

                                              "type": "boolean",

                                            },

                                              "type": "boolean",
                                              "description": "Indicates a day of the week, and is mandatory when recurring is set to true."
                                            }
                                          }
                                        }
                                      }
                                    },
                                    "singleTimer": {
                                      "type": "object",
                                      "description": "Single Timers only supported when VDBS parameter *supportsSingleTimer* in capability *chargingTimers* is set to true.",
                                      "nullable": true,
                                      "properties": {
                                        "occurringOn": {
                                          "type": "string",
                                          "example": "Wednesday",
                                          "description": "The one-time occurrence day of the week by when the charging should be completed."
                                        },
                                        "startTime": {
                                          "type": "string",
                                          "nullable": true,
                                          "example": "15:04",
                                          "description": "The one-time occurrence time by when the charging should be completed. Please be aware that this time is in UTC. Adjustable step size represented in minutes by VDBS parameter *timerStepSizeInMinutes* in capability *chargingTimers*."
                                        },
                                        "startDateTime": {
                                          "type": "string",
                                          "nullable": true,

                                          "type": "string",

                                        }
                                      }
                                    }
                                  }
                                }
                              },

                                "type": "boolean",
                                "example": false,

      "put": {
        "description": "Updates a charging profiles of the car. It requires the consented scope `manageCharging` and the capability `chargingProfiles` to be available and enabled.\n\nFor AUDI the `timers` array shall be empty. They can be changed via [PUT /charging/timers](#operation/putChargingTimers).\n\nFor PPE vehicles, `startDateTime` can be used when setting a `singleTimer` to pass an exact date and time.\nIn this case, if `startDateTime` is set, the values in `occurringOn` and `startTime` will be ignored.\n",

                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "requestID": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "123456"
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }

          "400": {

                "schema": {
                  "type": "string"

              }

      "post": {
        "description": "Creates a charging profile for the car. It requires the consented scope `manageCharging` and the capability `chargingProfiles` to be available and enabled.\n",
        "summary": "Charging Profiles",
        "tags": [
          "Charging"
        ],
        "operationId": "postChargingProfiles",
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "description": "A valid VIN",
            "required": true,
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "requestBody": {
          "required": true,
          "content": {
            "application/json;version=1": {
              "schema": {
                "required": [
                  "callback",
                  "profile"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "callback": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "a callback URL for VCF to provide the status of a charging action request. Needs to be a valid URL."
                  },
                  "profile": {
                    "properties": {
                      "name": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The name of the charging profile as specified by the user.",
                        "example": "Profile 1"
                      },
                      "postalAddress": {
                        "nullable": true,
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "Address of the charging location. (PPE-vehicles only)"
                      },
                      "position": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "nullable": true,
                        "description": "Position",
                        "properties": {
                          "lat": {
                            "type": "number",
                            "description": "Latitude"
                          },
                          "lon": {
                            "type": "number",
                            "description": "Longitude"
                          },
                          "alt": {
                            "type": "number",
                            "description": "Altitude",
                            "nullable": true
                          },
                          "gpsRadius_m": {
                            "type": "number",
                            "description": "Radius in m",
                            "nullable": true
                          }
                        }
                      },
                      "targetSOC_pct": {
                        "type": "number",
                        "nullable": true,
                        "description": "Target charge level set by the user. Defined as a percentage.",
                        "example": 50
                      },
                      "maxChargingCurrent": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "nullable": true,
                        "example": "reduced",
                        "enum": [
                          "max",
                          "reduced"
                        ],
                        "description": "Maximum Charging current to be used"
                      },
                      "minSOC_pct": {
                        "type": "integer",
                        "description": "Percentage of min SOC",
                        "example": 25,
                        "nullable": true
                      },
                      "minSOC_enabled": {
                        "type": "boolean",
                        "description": "Shows if min SOC is enabled",
                        "example": true,
                        "nullable": true
                      },
                      "preferredChargingTimes": {
                        "type": "array",
                        "items": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "properties": {
                            "id": {
                              "type": "number",
                              "description": "The unique identifier of this preferred charging time.",
                              "example": 1
                            },
                            "enabled": {
                              "type": "boolean",
                              "description": "Indicates if this preferred charging time should be used for charging optimization or not."
                            },
                            "startTime": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "nullable": true,
                              "description": "Specifies when the preferred charging time should start."
                            },
                            "startTimeLocal": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "nullable": true,
                              "description": "Specifies when the preferred charging time should start. Please be aware that this time should be in local time."
                            },
                            "endTime": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "nullable": true,
                              "description": "Specifies when the preferred charging time should stop."
                            },
                            "endTimeLocal": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "nullable": true,
                              "description": "Specifies when the preferred charging time should stop. Please be aware that this time should be in local time."
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      },
                      "Timers": {
                        "type": "array",
                        "items": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "properties": {
                            "climatisation": {
                              "type": "boolean",
                              "description": "Indicates if the climatisation should start (or not start), once the charging process is completed."
                            },
                            "enabled": {
                              "type": "boolean",
                              "description": "Indicates if this preferred charging time should be used for charging optimization or not."
                            },
                            "recurringTimer": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "nullable": true,
                              "properties": {
                                "startTime": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "nullable": true,
                                  "example": "15:04",
                                  "description": "The time by when the charging should be completed. This property is mandatory only when recurring is set to enabled, which indicates a recurring timer. Please be aware that this time is in UTC."
                                },
                                "startTimeLocal": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "nullable": true,
                                  "example": "15:04",
                                  "description": "The time by when the charging should be completed. This property is mandatory only when recurring is set to enabled, which indicates a recurring timer. Please be aware that this time is in local time."
                                },
                                "recurringOn": {
                                  "type": "object",
                                  "properties": {
                                    "mondays": {
                                      "type": "boolean",
                                      "description": "Indicates a day of the week, and is mandatory when recurring is set to true."
                                    },
                                    "tuesdays": {
                                      "type": "boolean",
                                      "description": "Indicates a day of the week, and is mandatory when recurring is set to true."
                                    },
                                    "wednesdays": {
                                      "type": "boolean",
                                      "description": "Indicates a day of the week, and is mandatory when recurring is set to true."
                                    },
                                    "thursdays": {
                                      "type": "boolean",
                                      "description": "Indicates a day of the week, and is mandatory when recurring is set to true."
                                    },
                                    "fridays": {
                                      "type": "boolean",
                                      "description": "Indicates a day of the week, and is mandatory when recurring is set to true."
                                    },
                                    "saturdays": {
                                      "type": "boolean",
                                      "description": "Indicates a day of the week, and is mandatory when recurring is set to true."
                                    },
                                    "sundays": {
                                      "type": "boolean",
                                      "description": "Indicates a day of the week, and is mandatory when recurring is set to true."
                                    }
                                  }
                                }
                              }
                            },
                            "singleTimer": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "nullable": true,
                              "properties": {
                                "occurringOn": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "example": "Wednesday",
                                  "description": "The one-time occurrence day of the week by when the charging should be completed."
                                },
                                "startTime": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "nullable": true,
                                  "example": "15:04",
                                  "description": "The one-time occurrence time by when the charging should be completed. Please be aware that this time is in UTC."
                                },
                                "startDateTime": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "nullable": true,
                                  "example": "2020-12-31T23:59:59Z",
                                  "description": "The exact date and time by when the charging should be completed, in UTC. Only for PPE.\n"
                                },
                                "startTimeLocal": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "nullable": true,
                                  "example": "15:04",
                                  "description": "The one-time occurrence time by when the charging should be completed. Please be aware that this time is in local time."
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }

    "/vehicles/{vin}/charging/timers": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "Get Charging Timers",
        "description": "Returns the charging timers. It requires the consented scope `charging` and the capability `chargingTimers` to be available. AUDI vehicles and PPE vehicles (brand independent) only.\n\nFor AUDI MOD4, `preferredChargingTimes` are available at [GET /charging/profiles](#operation/getChargingProfiles).\n",
        "operationId": "getChargingTimers",
        "tags": [
          "Charging"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "required": true,
            "description": "A valid VIN",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Charging Timers",
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "data": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "carCapturedTimestamp": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00Z",
                          "description": "Timestamp when the data was read last and sent by the car. Timestamp will be formatted as RFC3339.\n"
                        },
                        "timeInCar": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "2019-01-01T02:00:00+02:00",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "Time the user set in the car. This includes the timezone:\n* UTC: `2019-01-01T00:00:00Z`\n* Europe/Berlin: `2019-01-01T02:00:00+02:00`\n"
                        },
                        "timers": {
                          "type": "array",
                          "items": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "properties": {
                              "id": {
                                "type": "number",
                                "description": "The unique identifier of this preferred charging timer."
                              },
                              "profileID": {
                                "type": "number",
                                "nullable": true,
                                "description": "The profile the timer belongs to."
                              },
                              "climatisation": {
                                "type": "boolean",
                                "nullable": true,
                                "description": "Indicates if the climatisation should start (or not start), once the charging process is completed."
                              },
                              "enabled": {
                                "type": "boolean",
                                "description": "Indicates if this preferred charging time should be used for charging optimization or not."
                              },
                              "recurringTimer": {
                                "type": "object",
                                "nullable": true,
                                "properties": {
                                  "startTime": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "nullable": true,
                                    "example": "15:04",
                                    "description": "The time by when the charging should be completed. This property is mandatory only when recurring is set to enabled, which indicates a recurring timer. Please be aware that this time is in UTC."
                                  },
                                  "startTimeLocal": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "nullable": true,
                                    "example": "15:04",
                                    "description": "The time by when the charging should be completed. This property is mandatory only when recurring is set to enabled, which indicates a recurring timer. Please be aware that this time is in local time."
                                  },
                                  "recurringOn": {
                                    "type": "object",
                                    "properties": {
                                      "mondays": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Indicates a day of the week, and is mandatory when recurring is set to true."
                                      },
                                      "tuesdays": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Indicates a day of the week, and is mandatory when recurring is set to true."
                                      },
                                      "wednesdays": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Indicates a day of the week, and is mandatory when recurring is set to true."
                                      },
                                      "thursdays": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Indicates a day of the week, and is mandatory when recurring is set to true."
                                      },
                                      "fridays": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Indicates a day of the week, and is mandatory when recurring is set to true."
                                      },
                                      "saturdays": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Indicates a day of the week, and is mandatory when recurring is set to true."
                                      },
                                      "sundays": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Indicates a day of the week, and is mandatory when recurring is set to true."
                                      }
                                    }
                                  }
                                }
                              },
                              "singleTimer": {
                                "type": "object",
                                "nullable": true,
                                "properties": {
                                  "startDateTime": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "nullable": true,
                                    "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00Z",
                                    "description": "The one-time occurrence date & time. Please be aware that this timestamp is in UTC."
                                  },
                                  "startDateTimeLocal": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "nullable": true,
                                    "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00Z",
                                    "description": "The one-time occurrence date & time. Please be aware that this timestamp is in local time."
                                  }
                                }
                              },
                              "preferredChargingTimes": {
                                "nullable": true,
                                "type": "array",
                                "items": {
                                  "type": "object",
                                  "properties": {
                                    "id": {
                                      "type": "number",
                                      "description": "The unique identifier of this preferred charging time.",
                                      "example": 1
                                    },
                                    "enabled": {
                                      "type": "boolean",
                                      "description": "Indicates if this preferred charging time should be used for charging optimization or not."
                                    },
                                    "startTime": {
                                      "type": "string",
                                      "nullable": true,
                                      "description": "Specifies when the preferred charging time should start."
                                    },
                                    "startTimeLocal": {
                                      "type": "string",
                                      "nullable": true,
                                      "description": "Specifies when the preferred charging time should start. Please be aware that this time should be in local time."
                                    },
                                    "endTime": {
                                      "type": "string",
                                      "nullable": true,
                                      "description": "Specifies when the preferred charging time should stop."
                                    },
                                    "endTimeLocal": {
                                      "type": "string",
                                      "nullable": true,
                                      "description": "Specifies when the preferred charging time should stop. Please be aware that this time should be in local time."
                                    }
                                  }
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          },
                          "example": [
                            {
                              "id": 1,
                              "enabled": true,
                              "climatisation": false,
                              "singleTimer": {
                                "startDateTime": "2020-12-31T23:59:59Z"
                              },
                              "recurringTimer": null
                            },
                            {
                              "id": 2,
                              "enabled": true,
                              "climatisation": true,
                              "singleTimer": null,
                              "recurringTimer": {
                                "startTime": "06:09",
                                "recurringOn": {
                                  "mondays": true,
                                  "tuesdays": true,
                                  "wednesdays": true,
                                  "thursdays": true,
                                  "fridays": true,
                                  "saturdays": false,
                                  "sundays": false
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          ]
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          },

      "get": {
        "summary": "Climatisation Status",
        "description": "Returns the climatisation status including the currently set target temperature to be reached by the climatisation. For MOD1-3 it requires the consented scope `climatisation` and either the `climatisation`, `auxiliaryHeating` or `activeVentilation` capability to be enabled.",

              }
            },
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "properties": {
                    "data": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "climatisationStatus": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "Available when `climatisation` capability is enabled",
                          "properties": {
                            "carCapturedTimestamp": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00Z",
                              "description": "Timestamp when the data was read last and sent by the car. Timestamp will be formatted as RFC3339.\n"
                            },
                            "remainingClimatisationTime_min": {
                              "type": "integer",
                              "nullable": true,
                              "example": 30,
                              "description": "Estimated remaining climatisation time until the target temperature is reached,\nwhich was specified with settings or within the vehicle.\n"
                            },
                            "climatisationState": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "enum": [
                                "completed",
                                "cooling",
                                "heating",
                                "heatingAuxiliary",
                                "invalid",
                                "off",
                                "unsupported",
                                "ventilation"
                              ],
                              "description": "State of climatisation in vehicle.\n\nPossible values are:\n* `off`: no active climatisation\n* `cooling`: temperature inside vehicle is being cooled down by cooling aggregate\n* `heating`: temperature inside vehicle is being heated up by electric heating\n* `heatingAuxiliary`: heating through auxiliary source\n* `ventilation`: fan is blowing air from outside into the vehicle\n* `completed`: climatisation was running but is currently not active because target temperature was reached\n* `invalid`: invalid data, no state available\n* `unsupported`: vehicle does not support this information"
                            },
                            "climatisationTrigger": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "enum": [
                                "invalid",
                                "manual",
                                "timer",
                                "off",
                                "unsupported"

                              "example": "manual"
                            }

                                    "type": "string",
                                    "enum": [
                                      "off",
                                      "on",
                                      "invalid",
                                      "unsupported"
                                    ],
                                    "description": "Possible values are:\n* `off`: window heating at location is off\n* `on`: window heating at location is on\n* `invalid`: invalid data, no state available\n* `unsupported`: vehicle does not support this information or is not equipped with a window heater at the specified position"
                                  }
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        },
