    "/vehicles/{vin}/climatisation/settings": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "Climatisation Settings",
        "description": "Returns the climatisation settings. It requires the consented scope `climatisation`. For MOD4 it requires the consented scope `climatisation` and the capability `climatisation` to be enabled. For MOD1-3 it requires the consented scope `climatisation` and either the `climatisation`, `auxiliaryHeating` or `activeVentilation` capability to be enabled.",
        "operationId": "climatisationSettings",
        "tags": [
          "Climatisation"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "required": true,
            "description": "A valid VIN",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Climatisation Settings",
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=2": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "data": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "carCapturedTimestamp": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00Z",
                          "description": "Timestamp when the data was read last and sent by the car. Timestamp will be formatted as RFC3339.\n"
                        },
                        "targetTemperature_C": {
                          "type": "number",
                          "example": 23.5,
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "Temperature to be reached by climatisation in Celsius\n* Range: 15.5 C ... 30.0 C\n* The decimal digit for Celsius can either be 5 or 0. (15.5, 16.0, 16.5, 17.0, ..., 29.0, 29.5, 30.0)\n* Value will be nulled if sent temperature value doesn't fulfill the range and granularity as described above.\n* If no valid `unitInCar` then this value will be `null`.\n"
                        },
                        "targetTemperature_F": {
                          "type": "number",
                          "example": 75,
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "Temperature to be reached by climatisation in Fahrenheit\n* Range: 59.0 F ... 88.0 F\n* The decimal digit for Fahrenheit is always 0. (59.0, 60.0, 61.0, 62.0, ..., 86.0, 87.0, 88.0)\n* Value will be nulled if sent temperature value doesn't fulfill the range and granularity as described above.\n* If no valid `unitInCar` then this value will be `null`.\n"
                        },
                        "unitInCar": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "enum": [
                            "celsius",
                            "fahrenheit"
                          ],
                          "description": "This property will be always null for non-MOD4 vehicles.\n"
                        },
                        "heaterSource": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "enum": [
                            "electric",
                            "auxiliary",
                            "automatic",
                            "invalid",
                            "unsupported"
                          ],
                          "description": "This property is available for MOD3 vehicles with capability `hybridCarAuxiliaryHeating`\n"
                        },
                        "climatisationWithoutExternalPower": {
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "example": false,
                          "description": "Allow or forbid climatisation if no power connection available. Will be always null for MOD1-3 AUDI.\n"
                        },
                        "climatisationMode": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "comfort",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "The climatisation mode. Only for Audi PPE.\n\nPossible values are:\n* `comfort`\n* `economy`\n"
                        },
                        "climatizationAtUnlock": {
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "If true climatisation will start 5 min after opening the doors with the car key. (MOD4 only)\n"
                        },
                        "windowHeatingEnabled": {
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "If true window and mirror heating will be started when the customer starts climatisation.\n"
                        },
                        "zoneFrontLeftEnabled": {
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "If true seat heating will be started in the driver zone (if the steering wheel position is front-left).\nSeat heating will be started in the driver zone and the passenger seat (if the steering wheel position is NOT front-left).\n"
                        },
                        "zoneFrontRightEnabled": {
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "If true seat heating will be started in the driver zone and the passenger seat (if the steering wheel position is front-left).\nSeat heating will be started in the driver zone (if the steering wheel position is NOT front-left).\n"
                        },
                        "zoneRearLeftEnabled": {
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "If true seat heating will be started in the driver zone and the rear left zone.\n"
                        },
                        "zoneRearRightEnabled": {
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "If true seat heating will be started in the driver zone and the rear right zone.\n"
                        },
                        "zoneRearLeft2ndEnabled": {
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "If true seat heating will be started in the driver zone and the second rear left zone. (MQBw Baseline only)\n"
                        },
                        "zoneRearRight2ndEnabled": {
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "If true seat heating will be started in the driver zone and the second rear right zone. (MQBw Baseline only)\n"
                        },
                        "auxiliaryHeatingSettings": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "properties": {
                            "duration_min": {
                              "type": "integer",
                              "example": 10,
                              "description": "Minimum remaining time in minute for heating"
                            },
                            "startMode": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "example": "heating",
                              "description": "Start mode\n\nPossible values are:\n* `ventilation`\n* `heating`\n* `invalid`\n* `unsupported`\n",
                              "nullable": true,
                              "enum": [
                                "ventilation",
                                "heating",
                                "invalid",
                                "unsupported"
                              ]
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "activeVentilationSettings": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "properties": {
                            "duration_min": {
                              "type": "integer",
                              "example": 10,
                              "description": "Minimum remaining time in minute for ventilation"
                            },
                            "startMode": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "example": "invalid",
                              "description": "Start mode\n\nPossible values are:\n* `ventilation`\n* `heating`\n* `invalid`\n* `unsupported`\n",
                              "nullable": true,
                              "enum": [
                                "ventilation",
                                "heating",
                                "invalid",
                                "unsupported"
                              ]
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              },
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "data": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "carCapturedTimestamp": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00Z",
                          "description": "Timestamp when the data was read last and sent by the car. Timestamp will be formatted as RFC3339.\n"
                        },
                        "targetTemperature_K": {
                          "type": "number",
                          "example": 290.55,
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "Temperature to be reached by climatisation in Kelvin\n* Range: 288.65 K ... 303.15 K,\n* Values <= 288.65K interpreted as LO;\n* LO means vehicle cools down the interior in an unregulated manner until it is switched off manually\n* Values >= 303.15K interpreted as HI\n* HI means vehicle heats up the interior in an unregulated manner until it is switched off manually\n"
                        },
                        "unitInCar": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "enum": [
                            "celsius",
                            "fahrenheit"
                          ],
                          "description": "This property will be ignored for non-MOD4 vehicles.\n"
                        },
                        "climatisationWithoutExternalPower": {
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "example": false,
                          "description": "Allow or forbid climatisation if no power connection available\n"
                        },
                        "climatizationAtUnlock": {
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "nullable": true,

                        },
                        "windowHeatingEnabled": {
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "If true window and mirror heating will be started when the customer starts climatisation. (MOD4 only)\n"
                        },
                        "zoneFrontLeftEnabled": {
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "If true seat heating will be started in the driver zone (if the steering wheel position is front-left).\nSeat heating will be started in the driver zone and the passenger seat (if the steering wheel position is NOT front-left). (MOD4 only)\n"
                        },
                        "zoneFrontRightEnabled": {
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "nullable": true,

      "put": {
        "summary": "Climatisation Settings",
        "description": "Sets the climatisation settings. For MOD4 it requires the consented scope `manageClimatisation` and the capability `climatisation` to be available and enabled. For MOD1-3 it requires the consented scope `manageClimatisation` and either the `climatisation`, `auxiliaryHeating` or `activeVentilation` capability to be enabled.\n",
        "operationId": "setClimatisationSettings",
        "tags": [
          "Climatisation"
        ],

            "in": "header",

            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",

          }
        ],

                "required": [
                  "callback"

                    "description": "A callback URL for VCF to provide the status of start climatisation / set settings request. Needs to be a valid URL."
                  },

                    "nullable": true,

                          "heating",
                          "invalid",

                      }

                        "example": "invalid",

                          "ventilation",
                          "heating",
                          "invalid",
                          "unsupported"
                        ]
                      }
                    }
                  },
                  "targetTemperature": {
                    "nullable": true,
                    "type": "number",
                    "example": 19,
                    "description": "Temperature to be reached by climatisation in either Celsius or Fahrenheit.\n* Only values between 15,5 °C and 30 °C (in 0,5 °C steps) or between 59 °F and 88 °F (in 1 °F steps) are accepted.\n\nWill be ignored for AUDI MOD1-3 and can be omitted in that case. Needs to be set when VDBS parameter *supportsTargetTemperatureInSettings* in capability *climatisation* is set to true.\n\nOnly required if any clima settings shall be provided. For auxiliaryHeatingSettings & activeVentilationSettings it is optional.\n"
                  },
                  "targetTemperatureUnit": {
                    "nullable": true,
                    "type": "string",
                    "enum": [
                      "celsius",
                      "fahrenheit"
                    ],
                    "description": "Will be ignored for AUDI MOD1-3 and can be omitted in that case. Needs to be set when VDBS parameter *supportsTargetTemperatureInSettings* in capability *climatisation* is set to true.\n\nOnly required if any clima settings shall be provided. For auxiliaryHeatingSettings & activeVentilationSettings settings it is optional.\n"
                  },
                  "climatisationWithoutExternalPower": {
                    "type": "boolean",
                    "nullable": true,
                    "example": false,
                    "description": "Allow or forbid climatisation if no power connection available. Will be ignored for MOD1-3 AUDI and can be omitted in that case. Only settable when VDBS parameter *supportsOffGridClimatisation* in capability *climatisation* is set to true.\n"
                  },
                  "climatisationMode": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "example": "comfort",
                    "nullable": true,
                    "description": "The climatisation mode. Only for Audi PPE.\n\nPossible values are:\n* `comfort`\n* `economy`\n"
                  },

                    "type": "boolean",
                    "nullable": true,

                  },
                  "windowHeatingEnabled": {
                    "type": "boolean",
                    "nullable": true,

    "/vehicles/{vin}/climatisation/start": {
      "post": {
        "summary": "Start Climatisation",
        "description": "Starts the climatisation. It requires the consented scope `manageClimatisation` and the capability `climatisation` to be available and enabled.",
        "operationId": "startClimatisation",
        "tags": [
          "Climatisation"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "required": true,
            "description": "A valid VIN",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",

              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "requestBody": {
          "required": true,
          "content": {
            "application/json;version=2": {
              "schema": {
                "required": [
                  "callback"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "callback": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "A callback URL for VCF to provide the status of start climatisation / set settings request. Needs to be a valid URL."
                  },
                  "targetTemperature": {
                    "nullable": true,
                    "type": "number",
                    "example": 19,
                    "description": "Temperature to be reached by climatisation in either Celsius or Fahrenheit.\n* Only values between 15,5 °C and 30 °C (in 0,5 °C steps) or between 59 °F and 88 °F (in 1 °F steps) are accepted.\n\nOnly required if any settings shall be provided. Request can also be made with only the callback url. Needs to be set when VDBS parameter *supportsTargetTemperatureInStartClimatisation* in capability *climatisation* is set to true.\n"
                  },
                  "targetTemperatureUnit": {
                    "nullable": true,
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Only required if any settings shall be provided. Request can also be made with only the callback url. Needs to be set when VDBS parameter *supportsTargetTemperatureInStartClimatisation* in capability *climatisation* is set to true.",
                    "enum": [
                      "celsius",
                      "fahrenheit"
                    ]
                  },
                  "climatisationWithoutExternalPower": {
                    "type": "boolean",
                    "nullable": true,
                    "example": false,
                    "description": "Allow or forbid climatisation if no power connection available\n"
                  },
                  "climatisationMode": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "example": "comfort",
                    "nullable": true,
                    "description": "The climatisation mode. Only for Audi PPE.\n  Possible values are:\n  * `comfort`\n  * `economy`\n"
                  },
                  "climatizationAtUnlock": {
                    "type": "boolean",
                    "nullable": true,
                    "description": "If true climatisation will start 5 min after opening the doors with the car key. (MOD4 only).\n"
                  },
                  "windowHeatingEnabled": {
                    "type": "boolean",
                    "nullable": true,
                    "description": "If true window and mirror heating will be started when the customer starts climatisation. (MOD4 and MOD1-3 AUDI).\n"
                  },
                  "zoneFrontLeftEnabled": {
                    "type": "boolean",
                    "nullable": true,
                    "description": "If true seat heating will be started in the driver zone (if the steering wheel position is front-left).\nSeat heating will be started in the driver zone and the passenger seat (if the steering wheel position is NOT front-left). (MOD4 only).\n"
                  },
                  "zoneFrontRightEnabled": {
                    "type": "boolean",
                    "nullable": true,
                    "description": "If true seat heating will be started in the driver zone and the passenger seat (if the steering wheel position is front-left).\nSeat heating will be started in the driver zone (if the steering wheel position is NOT front-left). (MOD4 only).\n"
                  },
                  "zoneRearLeftEnabled": {
                    "type": "boolean",
                    "nullable": true,
                    "description": "If true seat heating will be started in the driver zone and the rear left zone. (MOD4 only).\n"
                  },
                  "zoneRearRightEnabled": {
                    "type": "boolean",
                    "nullable": true,
                    "description": "If true seat heating will be started in the driver zone and the rear right zone. (MOD4 only).\n"
                  }
                }
              }
            },
            "application/json;version=1": {
              "schema": {
                "required": [
                  "callback"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "callback": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "A callback URL for VCF to provide the status of start climatisation / set settings request. Needs to be a valid URL."
                  },
                  "targetTemperature_K": {
                    "nullable": true,
                    "type": "number",
                    "example": 290.55,
                    "description": "Temperature to be reached by climatisation in Kelvin.\n* Range: 288.65 K ... 303.15 K,\n* Values <= 288.65K interpreted as LO;\n* LO means vehicle cools down the interior in an unregulated manner until it is switched off manually\n* Values >= 303.15K interpreted as HI\n* HI means vehicle heats up the interior in an unregulated manner until it is switched off manually\n"
                  },
                  "unitInCar": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "nullable": true,
                    "enum": [
                      "celsius",
                      "fahrenheit"
                    ],

                    "type": "boolean",

                  "zoneFrontRightEnabled": {
                    "type": "boolean",
                    "nullable": true,

                  "zoneRearLeftEnabled": {
                    "type": "boolean",

    "/vehicles/{vin}/climatisation/timers": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "Climatisation Timers",
        "description": "Returns the climatisation timers. It requires the consented scope `climatisation` and the capabilities `climatisationTimers` OR `auxiliaryHeating` OR `activeVentilation` to be available and enabled.",
        "operationId": "climatisationTimers",
        "tags": [
          "Climatisation"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "required": true,
            "description": "A valid VIN",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Climatisation Timers",
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "data": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "carCapturedTimestamp": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00Z",
                          "description": "Timestamp when the data was read last and sent by the car. Timestamp will be formatted as RFC3339.\n"
                        },
                        "timeInCar": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "2019-01-01T02:00:00+02:00",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "Time the user set in the car. This includes the timezone:\n* UTC: `2019-01-01T00:00:00Z`\n* Europe/Berlin: `2019-01-01T02:00:00+02:00`\n"
                        },
                        "timers": {
                          "type": "array",
                          "items": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "properties": {
                              "id": {
                                "description": "The timer id. Defaults to 0.",
                                "type": "integer",
                                "example": 1
                              },
                              "enabled": {
                                "description": "The timer enabled state. Defaults to false. Enabling of several timers allowed when VDBS parameter *multipleActiveTimersAllowed* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* is set to true (depending on which endpoint is used).",
                                "type": "boolean",
                                "example": true
                              },
                              "singleTimer": {
                                "description": "Single timer. Defaults to null. Single Timers only supported when VDBS parameter *supportsSingleTimer* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* is set to true (depending on which endpoint is used).",
                                "type": "object",
                                "nullable": true,
                                "properties": {
                                  "startDateTime": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "nullable": true,
                                    "description": "A valid RFC 3339 timestamp such as 2019-01-01T00:00:00Z. Please be aware that this timestamp is in UTC. Adjustable step size represented in minutes by VDBS parameter *timerStepSizeInMinutes* in capability *climatisationTimers*.\n",
                                    "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                                  },
                                  "startDateTimeLocal": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "nullable": true,
                                    "description": "A timestamp such as 2019-01-01T00:00:00. Please be aware that this timestamp is in local time. Adjustable step size represented in minutes by VDBS parameter *timerStepSizeInMinutes* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* (depending on which endpoint is used).\n",
                                    "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00"
                                  }
                                }
                              },
                              "recurringTimer": {
                                "description": "Recurring timer. Defaults to null. Recurring Timers only supported when VDBS parameter *supportsRepeatingTimer* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* is set to true (depending on which endpoint is used).",
                                "nullable": true,
                                "type": "object",
                                "properties": {
                                  "startTime": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "nullable": true,
                                    "description": "Time formatted as `hh:mm`. The timer will be triggered at this time on the specified days (recurringOn). Please be aware that this time is in UTC. Adjustable step size represented in minutes by VDBS parameter *timerStepSizeInMinutes* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* (depending on which endpoint is used).\n",
                                    "example": "20:00"
                                  },
                                  "startTimeLocal": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "nullable": true,
                                    "description": "Time formatted as `hh:mm`. The timer will be triggered at this time on the specified days (recurringOn). Please be aware that this time is in local time. Adjustable step size represented in minutes by VDBS parameter *timerStepSizeInMinutes* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* (depending on which endpoint is used).\n",
                                    "example": "20:00"
                                  },
                                  "recurringOn": {
                                    "type": "object",
                                    "properties": {
                                      "mondays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "tuesdays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "wednesdays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "thursdays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "fridays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "saturdays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "sundays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      }
                                    }
                                  }
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          },
                          "example": [
                            {
                              "id": 1,
                              "enabled": true,
                              "singleTimer": {
                                "startDateTime": "2020-12-31T23:59:59Z"
                              },
                              "recurringTimer": null
                            },
                            {
                              "id": 2,
                              "enabled": true,
                              "singleTimer": null,
                              "recurringTimer": {
                                "startTime": "06:09",
                                "recurringOn": {
                                  "mondays": true,
                                  "tuesdays": true,
                                  "wednesdays": true,
                                  "thursdays": true,
                                  "fridays": true,
                                  "saturdays": false,
                                  "sundays": false
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          ]
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          },
          "400": {
            "description": "Bad request",
            "headers": {
              "VCF-Trace-ID": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "string"

                "description": "Identifier for the transaction triggered by the request"

            },

                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "code": {
                      "description": "For further information about the meaning of the error codes please check the [Error Codes](#tag/Error-Codes) section",
                      "type": "integer",
                      "format": "int32",
                      "example": 2105

                      "type": "string",

      "post": {
        "summary": "Climatisation Timers",
        "description": "Sets the climatisation timers. It requires the consented scope `manageClimatisation` and the capability\n`climatisationTimers` to be available and enabled. This is only valid for PPE vehicles.\n",
        "operationId": "postClimatisationTimers",
        "tags": [
          "Climatisation"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "required": true,
            "description": "A valid VIN",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "requestBody": {
          "required": true,
          "content": {
            "application/json;version=1": {
              "schema": {
                "required": [
                  "callback"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "callback": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "a callback URL for VCF to provide the status of this request. Needs to be a valid URL."
                  },
                  "timer": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "properties": {
                      "enabled": {
                        "description": "The timer enabled state. Defaults to false.",
                        "type": "boolean",
                        "example": true
                      },
                      "singleTimer": {
                        "description": "Single timer. Defaults to null. Single Timers only supported when VDBS parameter *supportsSingleTimer* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* is set to true (depending on which endpoint is used).",
                        "type": "object",
                        "nullable": true,
                        "properties": {
                          "startDateTime": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "nullable": true,
                            "description": "A valid RFC 3339 timestamp such as 2019-01-01T00:00:00Z. Please be aware that this timestamp is in UTC. Adjustable step size represented in minutes by VDBS parameter *timerStepSizeInMinutes* in capability *climatisationTimers*.\n",
                            "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                          },
                          "startDateTimeLocal": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "nullable": true,
                            "description": "A timestamp such as 2019-01-01T00:00:00. Please be aware that this timestamp is in local time. Adjustable step size represented in minutes by VDBS parameter *timerStepSizeInMinutes* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* (depending on which endpoint is used).\n",
                            "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00"
                          }
                        }
                      },
                      "recurringTimer": {
                        "description": "Recurring timer. Defaults to null. Recurring Timers only supported when VDBS parameter *supportsRepeatingTimer* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* is set to true (depending on which endpoint is used).",
                        "nullable": true,
                        "type": "object",
                        "properties": {
                          "startTime": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "nullable": true,
                            "description": "Time formatted as `hh:mm`. The timer will be triggered at this time on the specified days (recurringOn). Please be aware that this time is in UTC. Adjustable step size represented in minutes by VDBS parameter *timerStepSizeInMinutes* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* (depending on which endpoint is used).\n",
                            "example": "20:00"
                          },
                          "startTimeLocal": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "nullable": true,
                            "description": "Time formatted as `hh:mm`. The timer will be triggered at this time on the specified days (recurringOn). Please be aware that this time is in local time. Adjustable step size represented in minutes by VDBS parameter *timerStepSizeInMinutes* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* (depending on which endpoint is used).\n",
                            "example": "20:00"
                          },
                          "recurringOn": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "properties": {
                              "mondays": {
                                "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                "type": "boolean",
                                "example": true
                              },
                              "tuesdays": {
                                "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                "type": "boolean",
                                "example": true
                              },
                              "wednesdays": {
                                "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                "type": "boolean",
                                "example": true
                              },
                              "thursdays": {
                                "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                "type": "boolean",
                                "example": true
                              },
                              "fridays": {
                                "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                "type": "boolean",
                                "example": true
                              },
                              "saturdays": {
                                "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                "type": "boolean",
                                "example": true
                              },
                              "sundays": {
                                "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                "type": "boolean",
                                "example": true
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    },
                    "description": "The timer can be any single or recurring timer.",
                    "example": {
                      "enabled": true,
                      "singleTimer": {
                        "startDateTime": "2020-12-31T23:59:59Z"
                      }
                    }

      "put": {
        "summary": "Climatisation Timers",
        "description": "Sets the climatisation timers. It requires the consented scope `manageClimatisation` and the capability\n`climatisationTimers` to be available and enabled. (MOD4, MOD1-3 only for AUDI)\n\nAudi doesn't support recurring timers. If any of the timers in the request body includes a `recurringTimer`\nfor an Audi vehicle, the request will result with `Bad request`.\n",
        "operationId": "setClimatisationTimers",
        "tags": [
          "Climatisation"

                          "type": "integer",

                        },

                          "type": "boolean",
                          "example": true

            "in": "header",

              "example": "Bearer eyJraWQiOiLdF0..."

        ],

          "required": true,

            "application/json;version=1": {
              "schema": {
                "required": [
                  "callback"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "callback": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "a callback URL for VCF to provide the status of this request. Needs to be a valid URL."
                  },
                  "timers": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "id": {
                          "description": "The timer id. Defaults to 0.",
                          "type": "integer",
                          "example": 1
                        },
                        "enabled": {
                          "description": "The timer enabled state. Defaults to false. Enabling of several timers allowed when VDBS parameter *multipleActiveTimersAllowed* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* is set to true (depending on which endpoint is used).",
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "example": true
                        },
                        "singleTimer": {
                          "description": "Single timer. Defaults to null. Single Timers only supported when VDBS parameter *supportsSingleTimer* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* is set to true (depending on which endpoint is used).",
                          "type": "object",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "properties": {
                            "startDateTime": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "nullable": true,
                              "description": "A valid RFC 3339 timestamp such as 2019-01-01T00:00:00Z. Please be aware that this timestamp is in UTC. Adjustable step size represented in minutes by VDBS parameter *timerStepSizeInMinutes* in capability *climatisationTimers*.\n",
                              "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                            },
                            "startDateTimeLocal": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "nullable": true,
                              "description": "A timestamp such as 2019-01-01T00:00:00. Please be aware that this timestamp is in local time. Adjustable step size represented in minutes by VDBS parameter *timerStepSizeInMinutes* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* (depending on which endpoint is used).\n",
                              "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00"
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "recurringTimer": {
                          "description": "Recurring timer. Defaults to null. Recurring Timers only supported when VDBS parameter *supportsRepeatingTimer* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* is set to true (depending on which endpoint is used).",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "type": "object",
                          "properties": {
                            "startTime": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "nullable": true,
                              "description": "Time formatted as `hh:mm`. The timer will be triggered at this time on the specified days (recurringOn). Please be aware that this time is in UTC. Adjustable step size represented in minutes by VDBS parameter *timerStepSizeInMinutes* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* (depending on which endpoint is used).\n",
                              "example": "20:00"
                            },
                            "startTimeLocal": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "nullable": true,
                              "description": "Time formatted as `hh:mm`. The timer will be triggered at this time on the specified days (recurringOn). Please be aware that this time is in local time.                               "example": "20:00"
                            },
                            "recurringOn": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "properties": {
                                "mondays": {
                                  "description": "Defaults to false.",

                          }
                        }

                    "description": "The timers can be any combination out of single and recurring timers.                     "example": [

    "/vehicles/{vin}/auxiliaryheating/timerswithoutspin": {
      "put": {
        "summary": "Auxiliary Heating Climatisation Timers without SPIN",
        "description": "Sets the climatisation timers. It requires the consented scope `manageClimatisation` and the capability\n`auxiliaryHeating` to be available and enabled (MOD1-3 & PPE only).\nAccess to this endpoint is highly restricted, since it requires no SPIN.\n",
        "operationId": "setAuxiliaryHeatingTimersWithoutSPIN",
        "tags": [
          "Climatisation"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "required": true,
            "description": "A valid VIN",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "requestBody": {
          "required": true,
          "content": {
            "application/json;version=1": {
              "schema": {
                "required": [
                  "callback"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "callback": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "a callback URL for VCF to provide the status of this request. Needs to be a valid URL."
                  },
                  "timers": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "id": {
                          "description": "The timer id. Defaults to 0.",
                          "type": "integer",
                          "example": 1
                        },
                        "enabled": {
                          "description": "The timer enabled state. Defaults to false. Enabling of several timers allowed when VDBS parameter *multipleActiveTimersAllowed* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* is set to true (depending on which endpoint is used).",
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "example": true
                        },
                        "singleTimer": {
                          "description": "Single timer. Defaults to null. Single Timers only supported when VDBS parameter *supportsSingleTimer* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* is set to true (depending on which endpoint is used).",
                          "type": "object",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "properties": {
                            "startDateTime": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "nullable": true,
                              "description": "A valid RFC 3339 timestamp such as 2019-01-01T00:00:00Z. Please be aware that this timestamp is in UTC. Adjustable step size represented in minutes by VDBS parameter *timerStepSizeInMinutes* in capability *climatisationTimers*.\n",
                              "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                            },
                            "startDateTimeLocal": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "nullable": true,
                              "description": "A timestamp such as 2019-01-01T00:00:00. Please be aware that this timestamp is in local time. Adjustable step size represented in minutes by VDBS parameter *timerStepSizeInMinutes* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* (depending on which endpoint is used).\n",
                              "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00"
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "recurringTimer": {
                          "description": "Recurring timer. Defaults to null. Recurring Timers only supported when VDBS parameter *supportsRepeatingTimer* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* is set to true (depending on which endpoint is used).",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "type": "object",
                          "properties": {
                            "startTime": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "nullable": true,
                              "description": "Time formatted as `hh:mm`. The timer will be triggered at this time on the specified days (recurringOn). Please be aware that this time is in UTC. Adjustable step size represented in minutes by VDBS parameter *timerStepSizeInMinutes* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* (depending on which endpoint is used).\n",
                              "example": "20:00"
                            },
                            "startTimeLocal": {
                              "type": "string",

                              "example": "20:00"
                            },
                            "recurringOn": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "properties": {
                                "mondays": {
                                  "description": "Defaults to false.",

                    "description": "The timers can be any combination out of single and recurring timers.                           "example": true
                        },
                        "singleTimer": {

                          "nullable": true,

                            "startDateTime": {
                              "type": "string",

                            },
                            "startDateTimeLocal": {
                              "type": "string",

                              "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00"
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "recurringTimer": {
                          "description": "Recurring timer. Defaults to null. Recurring Timers only supported when VDBS parameter *supportsRepeatingTimer* in capability *climatisationTimers* or *auxiliaryHeating* is set to true (depending on which endpoint is used).",

                          "type": "object",
                          "properties": {
                            "startTime": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "nullable": true,

                              "example": "20:00"
                            },
                            "startTimeLocal": {

                    "description": "The timers can be any combination out of single and recurring timers.                   "callback"

      "get": {

        "operationId": "departureTimers",
        "tags": [
          "Departure"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "required": true,

              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",

            "schema": {
              "type": "string",

            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Departure Timers",
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "data": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "carCapturedTimestamp": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00Z",
                          "description": "Timestamp when the data was read last and sent by the car. Timestamp will be formatted as RFC3339.\n"
                        },
                        "heaterSource": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "enum": [
                            "electric"
                          ],
                          "nullable": true
                        },
                        "minSOC_pct": {
                          "type": "number",
                          "description": "Minimum charging level set by the user. Defined as a percentage.",
                          "example": 50,
                          "nullable": true
                        },
                        "timers": {
                          "type": "array",
                          "items": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "properties": {
                              "id": {
                                "description": "The timer id. Defaults to 0.",
                                "type": "integer",
                                "example": 1
                              },
                              "enabled": {
                                "description": "The timer enabled state. Defaults to false.",
                                "type": "boolean",
                                "example": true
                              },
                              "charging": {
                                "description": "True if the timer is used for charging",
                                "type": "boolean",
                                "example": false
                              },
                              "climatisation": {
                                "description": "True if the timer is used for climatisation",
                                "type": "boolean",
                                "example": true
                              },
                              "targetSOC_pct": {
                                "description": "Target charge level set by the user. Defined as a percentage. (Skoda only)",
                                "type": "integer",
                                "example": 80,
                                "nullable": true
                              },
                              "singleTimer": {
                                "description": "Single timer. Defaults to null.",
                                "type": "object",
                                "properties": {
                                  "startDateTimeLocal": {
                                    "nullable": true,
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "A timestamp in the format of 2019-01-01T00:00:00. Please be aware that this timestamp is in local time.\n",
                                    "example": "2020-12-31T23:59:59"
                                  }
                                }
                              },
                              "recurringTimer": {
                                "description": "Recurring timer. Defaults to null.",
                                "type": "object",
                                "properties": {
                                  "startTimeLocal": {
                                    "nullable": true,
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "Time formatted as `hh:mm`. The timer will be triggered at this time on the specified days (recurringOn). Please be aware that this time is in local time. Defaults to empty string.\n",
                                    "example": "20:00"
                                  },
                                  "recurringOn": {
                                    "type": "object",
                                    "properties": {
                                      "mondays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "tuesdays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "wednesdays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "thursdays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "fridays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "saturdays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "sundays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      }
                                    }
                                  }
                                }
                              },
                              "preferredChargingTimes": {
                                "type": "array",
                                "nullable": true,

                                      "example": 1
                                    },

                                      "type": "boolean",

                                    },

                                      "nullable": true,
                                      "type": "string",

                                    }
                                  }
                                }
                              }
                            }

                                },
                                "fridays": {
                                  "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                  "type": "boolean",
                                  "example": true
                                },
                                "saturdays": {
                                  "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                  "type": "boolean",
                                  "example": true
                                },
                                "sundays": {
                                  "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                  "type": "boolean",
                                  "example": true
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "preferredChargingTimes": {
                          "type": "array",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "items": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "properties": {
                              "id": {
                                "type": "number",
                                "description": "The unique identifier of this preferred charging time.",
                                "example": 1
                              },
                              "enabled": {
                                "type": "boolean",
                                "description": "Indicates if this preferred charging time should be used for charging optimization or not."
                              },
                              "startTimeLocal": {
                                "nullable": true,
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "Specifies when the preferred charging time should start."
                              },
                              "endTimeLocal": {
                                "nullable": true,
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "Specifies when the preferred charging time should stop."
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    },
                    "description": "Can have up to 3 timers. The timers can be any combination out of single and recurring timers."
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Departure Timers",
            "headers": {
              "VCF-Trace-ID": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "description": "Identifier for the transaction triggered by the request"
              }
            },

    "/vehicles/{vin}/departure/profiles": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "Departure Profiles",
        "description": "Returns the departure timers and profiles. It requires the consented scopes `charging` and \n`climatisation` and the capability `departureProfiles` to be available and enabled. (MOD2 only)\n",
        "operationId": "departureProfiles",
        "tags": [
          "Departure"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "required": true,
            "description": "A valid VIN",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Departure Profiles",
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "data": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "carCapturedTimestamp": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "example": "2019-01-01T00:00:00Z",
                          "description": "Timestamp when the data was read last and sent by the car. Timestamp will be formatted as RFC3339.\n"
                        },
                        "minSOC_pct": {
                          "type": "number",
                          "description": "Minimum charging level set by the user. Defined as a percentage.",
                          "example": 50,
                          "nullable": true
                        },
                        "timers": {
                          "type": "array",
                          "items": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "properties": {
                              "id": {
                                "description": "The timer id. Defaults to 0.",
                                "type": "integer",
                                "example": 1
                              },
                              "enabled": {
                                "description": "The timer enabled state. Defaults to false.",
                                "type": "boolean",
                                "example": true
                              },
                              "singleTimer": {
                                "description": "Single timer. Defaults to null.",
                                "type": "object",
                                "nullable": true,
                                "properties": {
                                  "startDateTime": {
                                    "nullable": true,
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "A timestamp in the format of 2019-01-01T00:00:00Z in UTC.\n",
                                    "example": "2020-12-31T23:59:59Z"
                                  }
                                }
                              },
                              "recurringTimer": {
                                "description": "Recurring timer. Defaults to null.",
                                "type": "object",
                                "nullable": true,
                                "properties": {
                                  "startTime": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "Time formatted as `hh:mm` in UTC. The timer will be triggered at this time on the\nspecified days (recurringOn).\n",
                                    "example": "20:00"
                                  },
                                  "recurringOn": {
                                    "type": "object",
                                    "properties": {
                                      "mondays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "tuesdays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "wednesdays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "thursdays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "fridays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "saturdays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "sundays": {
                                        "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "example": true
                                      }
                                    }
                                  }
                                }
                              },
                              "profileIDs": {
                                "type": "array",
                                "example": [
                                  1
                                ],
                                "description": "IDs of the profiles to which the timers should be attached.\n",
                                "items": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": ""
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          },
                          "example": [
                            {
                              "id": 1,
                              "enabled": true,
                              "singleTimer": {
                                "startDateTime": "2020-12-31T23:59:59Z"
                              },
                              "recurringTimer": null,
                              "profileIDs": [
                                1
                              ]
                            },
                            {
                              "id": 2,
                              "enabled": true,
                              "singleTimer": null,
                              "recurringTimer": {
                                "startTime": "06:09",
                                "recurringOn": {
                                  "mondays": true,
                                  "tuesdays": true,
                                  "wednesdays": true,
                                  "thursdays": true,
                                  "fridays": true,
                                  "saturdays": false,
                                  "sundays": false
                                }
                              },
                              "profileIDs": [
                                2
                              ]
                            }
                          ]
                        },
                        "profiles": {
                          "type": "array",
                          "items": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "properties": {
                              "id": {
                                "description": "The profile id. Defaults to 0.",
                                "type": "integer",
                                "example": 1
                              },
                              "name": {
                                "description": "The profile name.",
                                "type": "string",
                                "example": "profile"
                              },
                              "charging": {
                                "description": "True if the profile is activated for charging",
                                "type": "boolean",
                                "example": false
                              },
                              "climatisation": {
                                "description": "True if the profile is activated for climatisation",
                                "type": "boolean",
                                "example": true
                              },
                              "targetSOC_pct": {
                                "description": "Target charge level set by the user. Defined as a percentage.",
                                "type": "integer",
                                "example": 80,
                                "nullable": false
                              },
                              "maxChargeCurrentAC": {
                                "description": "Value that should be used when start charging, translates to amperes.",
                                "type": "integer",
                                "example": 2,
                                "nullable": false
                              },
                              "preferredChargingTimes": {
                                "type": "array",
                                "nullable": true,
                                "items": {
                                  "type": "object",
                                  "properties": {
                                    "id": {
                                      "type": "number",
                                      "description": "The unique identifier of this preferred charging time.",
                                      "example": 1
                                    },
                                    "enabled": {
                                      "type": "boolean",
                                      "description": "Indicates if this preferred charging time should be used for charging optimization or not."
                                    },
                                    "startTime": {
                                      "type": "string",
                                      "description": "Specifies when the preferred charging time should start in \"hh:mm\" format.",
                                      "example": "01:00"
                                    },
                                    "endTime": {
                                      "type": "string",
                                      "description": "Specifies when the preferred charging time should stop in \"hh:mm\" format.",
                                      "example": "03:00"
                                    }
                                  }
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          },
                          "example": [
                            {
                              "name": "name",
                              "id": 1,
                              "charging": true,
                              "climatisation": false,
                              "targetSOC_pct": 80,
                              "maxChargeCurrentAC": 32,
                              "preferredChargingTimes": [
                                {
                                  "id": 1,
                                  "enabled": true,
                                  "startTime": "00:00",
                                  "endTime": "01:00"
                                }
                              ]
                            }
                          ]
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }

          },

                  },
                  "timers": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "id": {
                          "description": "The timer id. Defaults to 0.",
                          "type": "integer",
                          "example": 1
                        },
                        "enabled": {
                          "description": "The timer enabled state. Defaults to false.",
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "example": true
                        },
                        "singleTimer": {
                          "description": "Single timer. Defaults to null.",
                          "type": "object",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "properties": {
                            "startDateTime": {
                              "nullable": true,
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "A timestamp in the format of 2019-01-01T00:00:00Z in UTC.\n",
                              "example": "2020-12-31T23:59:59Z"
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "recurringTimer": {
                          "description": "Recurring timer. Defaults to null.",
                          "type": "object",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "properties": {
                            "startTime": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "Time formatted as `hh:mm` in UTC. The timer will be triggered at this time on the\nspecified days (recurringOn).\n",
                              "example": "20:00"
                            },
                            "recurringOn": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "properties": {
                                "mondays": {
                                  "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                  "type": "boolean",
                                  "example": true
                                },
