                                  "example": true
                                },
                                "wednesdays": {
                                  "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                  "type": "boolean",
                                  "example": true
                                },
                                "thursdays": {
                                  "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                  "type": "boolean",
                                  "example": true
                                },
                                "fridays": {
                                  "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                  "type": "boolean",
                                  "example": true
                                },
                                "saturdays": {
                                  "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                  "type": "boolean",
                                  "example": true
                                },
                                "sundays": {
                                  "description": "Defaults to false.",
                                  "type": "boolean",
                                  "example": true
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "profileIDs": {
                          "type": "array",
                          "example": [
                            1
                          ],
                          "description": "IDs of the profiles to which the timers should be attached.\n",
                          "items": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "description": ""
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    },
                    "description": "Can have up to 3 timers. The timers can be any combination out of single and recurring timers."
                  },

                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "id": {
                          "description": "The profile id. Defaults to 0.",
                          "type": "integer",
                          "example": 1

                          "description": "The profile name.",
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "profile"
                        },
                        "charging": {
                          "description": "True if the profile is activated for charging",
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "example": false
                        },

                          "description": "True if the profile is activated for climatisation",
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "example": true
                        },

                          "description": "Target charge level set by the user. Defined as a percentage.",
                          "type": "integer",
                          "example": 80,
                          "nullable": false
                        },

                          "description": "Value that should be used when start charging, translates to amperes.",
                          "type": "integer",
                          "example": 2,
                          "nullable": false
                        },

                          "type": "array",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "items": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "properties": {
                              "id": {
                                "type": "number",
                                "description": "The unique identifier of this preferred charging time.",
                                "example": 1
                              },
                              "enabled": {
                                "type": "boolean",
                                "description": "Indicates if this preferred charging time should be used for charging optimization or not."
                              },
                              "startTime": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "Specifies when the preferred charging time should start in \"hh:mm\" format.",
                                "example": "01:00"
                              },
                              "endTime": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "Specifies when the preferred charging time should stop in \"hh:mm\" format.",
                                "example": "03:00"
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    },
                    "description": "Can have up to 3 timers. The timers can be any combination out of single and recurring timers."

                          "example": true
                        },

                          "description": "True if the timer is used for charging",

                          "example": false

                          "type": "boolean",

                        },

                              "nullable": true,

                              "description": "A timestamp in the format of 2019-01-01T00:00:00. Please be aware that this timestamp is in local time.\n",
                              "example": "2020-12-31T23:59:59"
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "recurringTimer": {
                          "description": "Recurring timer. Defaults to null.",
                          "type": "object",
                          "properties": {
                            "startTimeLocal": {
                              "nullable": true,
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "Time formatted as `hh:mm`. The timer will be triggered at this time on the specified days (recurringOn). Please be aware that this time is in local time. Defaults to empty string.\n",
                              "example": "20:00"
                            },
                            "recurringOn": {
                              "type": "object",

          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "The saved destinations of a car",
            "headers": {
              "VCF-Trace-ID": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "description": "Identifier for the transaction triggered by the request"
              }
            },
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "properties": {
                    "data": {
                      "type": "array",
                      "items": {
                        "required": [
                          "address",
                          "destinationName"
                        ],
                        "type": "object",
                        "properties": {
                          "id": {
                            "description": "The destination Id.",
                            "type": "string",
                            "example": "12345"
                          },
                          "address": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "properties": {
                              "addressType": {
                                "description": "Possible Values:\n* [0 - Unknown]\n* [16 - Private Address Data]\n* [32 -  Business Address Data]\n",

                                "example": 0
                              },

                                "description": "The name of the city.",

                                "example": "Germany"
                              },

                                "description": "The name of the destinations region.",
                                "type": "string",
                                "example": "Berlin"
                              },
                              "stateAbbreviation": {
                                "description": "The short country code.",
                                "type": "string",
                                "example": "B"
                              },
                              "street": {
                                "description": "The name of the destinations street.",
                                "type": "string",
                                "example": "Stralauer Allee"
                              },
                              "zipCode": {
                                "description": "The ZIP code of the destination.",
                                "type": "string",
                                "example": "10245"
                              }
                            }
                          },
                          "destinationSource": {
                            "description": "The source of the current destination.\nPossible Sources are:\n* `Browser`\n* `CallCenter`\n* `Email`\n* `MobileApp`\n* `TravelGuide`\n* `Unknown`\n* `WebPortal`\n",
                            "type": "string",
                            "example": "Unknown"
                          },
                          "geoCoordinate": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "properties": {
                              "latitude": {
                                "description": "The decimal containing the destinations latitude in decimal degrees.",
                                "type": "number",
                                "example": 19.272
                              },
                              "longitude": {
                                "description": "The decimal containing the destinations longitude in decimal degrees.",
                                "type": "number",
                                "example": 32.144
                              }
                            }
                          },
                          "destinationName": {
                            "description": "The name of the destination.",
                            "type": "string",
                            "example": "Post Office"
                          },
                          "customId": {
                            "description": "A customId that might be used by the client app or portal to identify identical destinations across different vehicles. Any ID that is unique for destinations could be used (Google Place IDs or similar)\n",
                            "type": "string",
                            "example": "12345"
                          },
                          "fetchStatus": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "enum": [
                              "Succeeded",
                              "Failed",
                              "Pending",
                              "Deactivated"
                            ],
                            "description": "* `Succeeded` when the destination has been downloaded successfully by the vehicle.\n* `Failed` when the destination has failed to be downloaded by the vehicle.\n* `Pending` in case the destination will be downloaded by the vehicle.\n* `Deactivated` in case the destination has been disabled and will not be downloaded by the vehicle\n",
                            "example": "Succeeded"
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          },

      "post": {
        "summary": "Send Destination",
        "description": "Sends a destination. It requires the consented scope `navigation` and it also requires the capability `destinationManagement` to be available and enabled.",
        "tags": [
          "Destinations"
        ],
        "operationId": "sendDestination",
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",

              "type": "string"

          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "requestBody": {
          "required": true,
          "content": {
            "application/json;version=1": {
              "schema": {

                  "address",

                ],

                    "description": "The destination Id.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "example": "12345"
                  },
                  "address": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "properties": {
                      "addressType": {
                        "description": "Possible Values:\n* [0 - Unknown]\n* [16 - Private Address Data]\n* [32 -  Business Address Data]\n",
                        "type": "integer",
                        "example": 0
                      },
                      "city": {
                        "description": "The name of the city.",
                        "type": "string",
                        "example": "Berlin"
                      },

                        "example": "Germany"

      "put": {
        "summary": "Update Destination",
        "description": "Updates the destination of a MOD3-4 vehicle (MOD3 only supported with v2). It requires the consented scope `navigation`. Additionally the user capability `destinations` is required.",
        "tags": [
          "Destinations"
        ],
        "operationId": "updateDestination",
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "description": "A valid VIN",
            "required": true,
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "requestBody": {
          "required": true,
          "content": {
            "application/json;version=2": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "array",
                "items": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "destinationName": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "example": "Post Office"
                    },
                    "destinationType": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "enum": [
                        "stopover",
                        "reliableChargeStop",
                        "volatileChargeStop"
                      ],
                      "description": "The type of destination.",
                      "example": "stopover"
                    },
                    "geoCoordinate": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "latitude": {
                          "description": "The decimal containing the destinations latitude in decimal degrees. Defaults to 0.",
                          "type": "number",
                          "example": 19.272
                        },
                        "longitude": {
                          "description": "The decimal containing the destinations longitude in decimal degrees. Defaults to 0.",
                          "type": "number",
                          "example": 32.144
                        },
                        "altitude": {
                          "description": "The decimal containing the destinations altitude in decimal degrees. Defaults to 0.",
                          "type": "number",
                          "example": 32.144
                        }
                      }
                    },
                    "chargingStationDetails": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "nullable": true,
                      "description": "Will be ignored for MOD3 vehicles and can be omitted",
                      "properties": {
                        "currentType": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "enum": [
                            "AC",
                            "DC"
                          ],
                          "description": "The type of current.",
                          "example": "AC"
                        },
                        "chargeSpots": {
                          "type": "integer",
                          "description": "The numer of charge spots.",
                          "example": 2
                        },
                        "operator": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "The operator.",
                          "example": "EnBW"
                        },
                        "provider": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "The provider.",
                          "example": "Elli"
                        },
                        "additionalInformation": {
                          "description": "Extra information.",
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "ABC"
                        },
                        "priceModel": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "The price model.",
                          "example": "XYZ"
                        },
                        "paymentMethod": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "enum": [
                            "vwCard",
                            "providerSpecific",
                            "common"
                          ],
                          "description": "The payment method.",
                          "example": "vwCard"
                        },
                        "maxChargePower_W": {
                          "type": "integer",
                          "example": 1100
                        }
                      }
                    },
                    "address": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "city": {
                          "description": "The name of the city. Defaults to empty string.",
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "Berlin"
                        },
                        "country": {
                          "description": "The full country name. Defaults to empty string.",
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "Germany"
                        },
                        "stateAbbreviation": {
                          "description": "The short country code. Defaults to empty string.",
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "B"
                        },
                        "street": {
                          "description": "The name of the destinations street. Defaults to empty string.",
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "Stralauer Allee"
                        },
                        "houseNumber": {
                          "description": "The house number of the destinations street. Defaults to empty string.",
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "7b"
                        },
                        "zipCode": {
                          "description": "The ZIP code of the destination. Defaults to empty string.",
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "10245"
                        }
                      }
                    },
                    "poiProvider": {
                      "description": "Provider of the point of interest. Defaults to empty string.\nPossible providers are:\n* `google`\n* `unknown`\n",
                      "type": "string",
                      "example": "google"
                    },
                    "sendToVehicle": {
                      "nullable": true,
                      "type": "boolean",
                      "example": true
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },

            "description": "Destination was successfully updated (MOD1 and MOD2)",

      "get": {
        "summary": "Measurements",
        "description": "Gets vehicle measurements. It requires the capability `measurements` to be available and enabled. Depending on the requested measurement a different consented scope is required.\n\n| Measurement ID                    |        Consent Scope |\n|-----------------------------------|----------------------|\n| fuelLevel                         | fuelLevels           |\n| range                             | range                |\n| odometer                          | mileage              |\n| temperatureOutside                | intExtTemperature    |\n| temperatureBattery                | intExtTemperature    |\n",
        "tags": [
          "Measurements"
        ],
        "operationId": "getMeasurements",
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "description": "A valid VIN",
            "required": true,
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "query",
            "name": "id",
            "description": "The specific measurement ID as described in the table above",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "enum": [
                "range",
                "fuelLevel",
                "odometer",
                "temperatureOutside",
                "temperatureBattery"
              ]
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {

            "description": "The requested measurement of the car",

                      "type": "array",

                        "type": "object",

                            "type": "string",
                            "enum": [
                              "range",
                              "fuelLevel",
                              "odometer",
                              "temperatureOutside",
                              "temperatureBattery"
                            ],
                            "description": "Describes the type of this measurement",
                            "example": "range"
                          },
                          "carCapturedTimestamp": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "Time when the measurement was retrieved from the car",
                            "format": "date-time"
                          },
                          "properties": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "description": "Array of key value models holding the measurement information",
                            "example": [
                              {
                                "name": "electricRange_km",
                                "value": "420"
                              },
                              {
                                "name": "primaryEngineType",
                                "value": "electric"
                              }
                            ],
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "properties": {
                                "name": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "enum": [
                                    "adBlueRange_km",
                                    "cngRange_km",
                                    "currentCngLevel_pct",
                                    "currentFuelLevel_pct",
                                    "currentSOC_pct",
                                    "dieselRange_km",
                                    "electricRange_km",
                                    "gasolineRange_km",
                                    "lpgRange_km",
                                    "odometer_km",
                                    "petrolRange_km",
                                    "primaryEngineType",
                                    "secondaryEngineType",
                                    "temperatureHvBatteryMax_K",
                                    "temperatureHvBatteryMin_K",
                                    "temperatureOutside_K"
                                  ],
                                  "description": "Key of measurement",
                                  "example": "electricRange_km"
                                },
                                "value": {
                                  "nullable": true,
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "Value of measurement",
                                  "example": "420"
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              },
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "properties": {
                    "data": {
                      "type": "array",
                      "description": "Array of measurements",
                      "items": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Represents a single data item gathered from the vehicle",
                        "properties": {
                          "id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "enum": [
                              "range",
                              "fuelLevel",
                              "odometer",
                              "temperatureOutside",
                              "temperatureBattery"
                            ],
                            "description": "Describes the type of this measurement",
                            "example": "range"
                          },

                            "type": "string",

                            "format": "date-time"

        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "description": "A valid VIN",
            "required": true,
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "X-Device-ID",
            "description": "Device id.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            },
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "X-App-Name",
            "description": "App name.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            },
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "X-App-Version",
            "description": "App version.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "requestBody": {
          "required": true,
          "content": {
            "application/json;version=1": {
              "schema": {
                "required": [
                  "callback",
                  "encryptedData"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "callback": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "a callback URL for VCF to provide the status of a engine action request. Needs to be a valid URL.",
                    "example": {
                      "callback": "https://example.com/mycallback"
                    }
                  },
                  "encryptedData": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Required by MBB (authRsData)."
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Pair Mobile Device Response",
            "headers": {
              "VCF-Trace-ID": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "description": "Identifier for the transaction triggered by the request"
              }
            },
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "data": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "requestID": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "123456"
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          },
          "400": {
            "description": "Bad request",
            "headers": {
              "VCF-Trace-ID": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "description": "Identifier for the transaction triggered by the request"
              }
            },
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "code": {
                      "description": "For further information about the meaning of the error codes please check the [Error Codes](#tag/Error-Codes) section",
                      "type": "integer",
                      "format": "int32",
                      "example": 2105
                    },
                    "message": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "example": "The provided body is incorrect"
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          },
          "401": {
            "description": "Unauthorized",
            "headers": {
              "VCF-Trace-ID": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "description": "Identifier for the transaction triggered by the request"
              }
            },

                      "type": "integer",
                      "format": "int32",
                      "example": 4003

                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "code": {
                      "description": "For further information about the meaning of the error codes please check the [Error Codes](#tag/Error-Codes) section",

                      "format": "int32",
                      "example": 4004
                    },
                    "message": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "example": "The performed call cannot be executed due to missing user consent"
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          },
          "500": {
            "description": "Internal server error",

                  "type": "string"

                  "type": "object",

                      "example": 4001
                    },

                      "type": "string",

                    }
                  }

              }

        "summary": "Unpair",

    "/vehicles/{vin}/newsfeeds": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "Get News Feeds",
        "description": "Returns the news feeds of a vehicle for a given user/VIN combination. It requires the consented scope `rssFeeds` for the given VIN and it also requires the capability `news` to be available and enabled. MOD1-3 only.\n",
        "operationId": "getNewsFeeds",
        "tags": [
          "News Feeds"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "required": true,

              "type": "string"

          },
          {

            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "News feeds",
            "headers": {

              }
            },
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "properties": {
                    "data": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "standardFeeds": {
                          "type": "array",
                          "items": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "properties": {
                              "feedID": {
                                "description": "The feed ID.",
                                "type": "string",
                                "example": "466264665"
                              },
                              "title": {
                                "description": "The feed title.",
                                "type": "string",
                                "example": "DER SPIEGEL - Schlagzeilen - Eilmeldungen"
                              },
                              "description": {
                                "description": "The feed description.",
                                "type": "string",
                                "example": "Deutschlands führende Nachrichtenseite. Alles Wichtige aus Politik, Wirtschaft, Sport, Kultur, Wissenschaft, Technik und mehr."
                              },
                              "feedUrl": {
                                "description": "The feed url.",
                                "type": "string",
                                "example": "https://www.spiegel.de/schlagzeilen/eilmeldungen/index.rss"
                              },
                              "logoUrl": {
                                "description": "The feed's logo url. Defaults to `afp_logo_small_vw`.",

                                "description": "The feed title.",
                                "type": "string",

                              },

      "post": {
        "summary": "Post News Feed",
        "description": "Posts a news feeds for a given user/VIN combination. It requires the consented scope `rssFeeds` for the given VIN and it also requires the capability `news` to be available and enabled. MOD1-3 only.\n",
        "operationId": "postNewsFeeds",
        "tags": [
          "News Feeds"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "required": true,
            "description": "A valid VIN",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "requestBody": {
          "required": true,
          "content": {
            "application/json;version=1": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                  "feedUrl": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "A valid rss url. Defaults to empty string.",
                    "example": "https://www.spiegel.de/schlagzeilen/eilmeldungen/index.rss"
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "201": {
            "description": "News Feed is successfully saved",
            "headers": {
              "VCF-Trace-ID": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "string"
                }
              }
            }
          },
          "400": {
            "description": "Bad Request",
            "headers": {
              "VCF-Trace-ID": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "description": "Identifier for the transaction triggered by the request"
              }
            },
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {

                  "type": "object",

                "schema": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "description": "Identifier for the transaction triggered by the request"
              }
            },
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "code": {
                      "description": "For further information about the meaning of the error codes please check the [Error Codes](#tag/Error-Codes) section",
                      "type": "integer",
                      "format": "int32",
                      "example": 4001
                    },
                    "message": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "example": "Internal error"

    "/notifications": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "Notifications",
        "description": "Websocket endpoint to connect to in order to receive notifications. Please use `wss://` to connect not `https://`.\n\nAccording to the client ID sent in the IdentityKit token, notifications for the subscribed topics will be sent.\nBefore each notification is sent throught the websocket a consent check will be done to make sure the user\nhasn't revoked their consent since subscribing. If the user has revoked their consent no notification message\nwill be sent for that specific topic.\n\nAn overview of topics is available [here](#tag/Notifications).\n\n|Error|Description|Solution|\n|----|-----------|-----------|\n|fail | The request could not be executed | Please try again.|\n|fail_battery_conditioning_priority | The climatisation failed because battery care has higher priority | Please wait until battery care is complete or change the settings defining the priority.|\n|fail_battery_low | The climatisation failed due to low energy level in the battery | Please recharge your vehicle.|\n|fail_charge_plug_not_connected | The climatisation failed because charge plus was not connected | Please connect the charge plug.|\n|fail_charging_priority | The climatisation failed because charging has higher priority | Please wait until charging is complete or change the settings defining the priority.|\n|fail_ignition_on | The command can't be processed because the ignition of the vehicle is on | Please turn the ignition off.|\n|fail_no_external_power | Plug is connected but no power is supplied.|\n|fail_plug_autolock_error | The charging plug is not auto locked to the vehicle | Please reconnect the plug.|\n|fail_plug_disconnected | The charging plug is not connected to the vehicle | Please connect the plug.|\n|fail_timer_charging_active | There's already a charging timer set in the vehicle | Please delete the timer.|\n|fail_vehicle_is_offline | The vehicle is offline ||\n|timeout | A timeout occurred in the vehicle control unit during processing a job | Please try again.|\n|warning_slow_charging | The charging is slowed down because of an emergency state of the charging unit | Charging process was slowed down.|\n",
        "tags": [
          "Notifications"
        ],
        "operationId": "getNotifications",
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "All notifications of all topics have the same schema",
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "properties": {
                    "VIN": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "example": "1FDUF4GY9FEC80835"
                    },
                    "userId": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "example": "2d8c6554-a700-4310-ab6a-22106cdef0c9"
                    },
                    "type": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "enum": [
                        "access/status",
                        "access/lock",
                        "access/unlock",
                        "alerts/childpresence",
                        "alerts/geofence",
                        "alerts/speed",
                        "alerts/theftalarm",

                        "states/parkingbrake",

                      ]

                      "type": "string",
                      "example": "7dd25b47-2e10-468b-8e5a-554dc85562d1"
                    },
                    "carCapturedTimestamp": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "example": "2020-02-28T15:32:18.000Z"
                    },

                      "type": "string",

                        "batterySupport",

                      "type": "string",

                      "example": "error"
                    },
                    "data": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "nullable": true,
                      "description": "For some notifications, you will receive additional data in this field.                               "type": "string",

                            },

                              "type": "string",

                            },

                              "type": "string",
                              "example": "Sydney"
                            },

                              "type": "string",
                              "example": "mapcode"
                            },
                            "phone": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "example": "+61293512222"
                            }
                          }
                        },

                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "google"
                        },

                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "Google POI ID, required if poiProvider is google",
                          "example": "ChIJgUbEo8cfqokR5lP9_Wh_DaM"

                            },

                              "type": "number",
                              "nullable": true,
                              "example": 151.18734939763442
                            }
                          }
                        },

                          "nullable": false,
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "The University of Sydney"

    "/vehicles/{vin}/plugandcharge/install": {
      "post": {
        "description": "Installs the plug and charge contract for the vehicle. It requires the consented scope `plugAndCharge` as well as the capability `plugandCharge`.\n\nIf the contract installation process eventually finishes the provided callback URL will receive the following payload:\n```\n{\n  \"requestID\": \"c3eabd4a-3541-404c-9a9c-a91fe39d1d47\",\n  \"status\": \"fail\", // \"successful\"\n  \"code\": \"FAILED_XYZ\" // error code if fail; specific error codes unknown as of yet\n}\n```\n",
        "summary": "Install Plug and Charge",
        "tags": [
          "Plug and Charge"
        ],
        "operationId": "installPlugAndCharge",
        "parameters": [

            "name": "vin",

            }
          },
          {

    "/vehicles/{vin}/plugandcharge/requests/{requestID}": {
      "get": {
        "description": "Returns the status of the request to install plug and charge contract for the vehicle. It requires the consented scope `plugAndCharge` and the capability `plugAndCharge`.\n",
        "summary": "Plug and Charge Request Status",
        "tags": [
          "Plug and Charge"
        ],
        "operationId": "getPlugAndChargeRequestStatus",
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "description": "A valid VIN",
            "required": true,
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "name": "requestID",
            "in": "path",
            "description": "A valid request ID",
            "required": true,
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Successful response",
            "headers": {
              "VCF-Trace-ID": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "description": "Identifier for the transaction triggered by the request"
              }
            },
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "properties": {
                    "data": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "status": {
                          "description": "Detailed explainations can be found [here](#tag/Request-Status-Codes)",
                          "enum": [
                            "successful",
                            "in_progress",
                            "fail"
                          ],
                          "type": "string",
                          "example": "in_progress"
                        },
                        "code": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "nullable": true,
                          "description": "error code if fail; specific error codes unknown as of yet",
                          "example": "FAILED_XYZ"
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          },
          "400": {
            "description": "Bad request",
            "headers": {
              "VCF-Trace-ID": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "description": "Identifier for the transaction triggered by the request"
              }
            },
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "code": {
                      "description": "For further information about the meaning of the error codes please check the [Error Codes](#tag/Error-Codes) section",
                      "type": "integer",
                      "format": "int32",
                      "example": 2105
                    },
                    "message": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "example": "The provided body is incorrect"
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          },
          "401": {
            "description": "Unauthorized",
            "headers": {
              "VCF-Trace-ID": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "description": "Identifier for the transaction triggered by the request"
              }
            },
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "code": {
                      "description": "For further information about the meaning of the error codes please check the [Error Codes](#tag/Error-Codes) section",
                      "type": "integer",
                      "format": "int32",
                      "example": 4003
                    },
                    "message": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "example": "The performed call is unauthorized"
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          },
          "403": {
            "description": "Forbidden",
            "headers": {
              "VCF-Trace-ID": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "string"

                "description": "Identifier for the transaction triggered by the request"

        ],

                                "location",
                                "access",
                                "emergency",
                                "off"
                              ],
                              "description": "The category, or threshold, to which the last reported battery percentage correlates to for the given vehicle.",
                              "example": "comfort"
                            },
                            "dailyPowerBudgetAvailable": {
                              "type": "boolean",
                              "description": "True if the vehicle still has available daily power budget.",
                              "example": true
                            }
                          }
                        },

                          "type": "object",
                          "properties": {
                            "insufficientBatteryLevelWarning": {
                              "type": "boolean",
                              "description": "True if the vehicles low voltage battery power level has decreased to 35%-30%.",

                            },

              }
            },

                    "code": {

                      "format": "int32",
                      "example": 4004

    "/vehicles/{vin}/readiness/infotainmentwakeup": {
      "post": {
        "summary": "Infotainment Wakeup",
        "security": [
          {
            "IdentityKitToken": [
              "userToken"
            ]
          }
        ],
        "description": "Can be used to wake up the vehicles infotainment for the given duration.\n",
        "operationId": "postInfotainmentWakeup",
        "tags": [
          "Readiness"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",

            "required": true,

              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",

              "format": "uuid"

            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "requestBody": {
          "required": true,
          "content": {
            "application/json;version=1": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                  "duration_min": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "example": 15,
                    "nullable": false,
                    "description": "The duration for how long the vehicle should be awake. Must be between 1 and 60."

                "schema": {

                        "messages": {
                          "type": "array",

                            "type": "object",
                            "properties": {
                              "id": {
                                "type": "string",

    "/vehicles/{vin}/transactionhistory/last": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "Transaction History Last",
        "description": "Returns the last item of each category from all transaction history data. It requires the same consent scopes and capabilities as in `/vehicles/{vin}/transactionhistory`",
        "tags": [
          "Transaction History"
        ],
        "operationId": "transactionHistoryLast",
        "parameters": [

            "name": "vin",

            "required": true,
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },

            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",

        ],

          "200": {
            "description": "Transaction History\n",
            "headers": {
              "VCF-Trace-ID": {
                "schema": {

                },

              }
            },

                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",

                    "data": {
                      "type": "object",

                            "type": "object",

                              "id": {
                                "type": "string",

                                "type": "string",

                                  "speedalert",
                                  "valet"
                                ]

                                "type": "string",

                              },

                                "type": "boolean",

                              },

                                "type": "string",

                                "type": "integer",

                                "type": "string",
                                "nullable": true,

                                "description": "Timestamp of event in UTC.\n"
                              }

                          }

        ],
        "operationId": "latestShortTermTrip",
        "parameters": [

            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "The latest short term trip data of a vehicle",

              "VCF-Trace-ID": {
                "schema": {

                },
                "description": "Identifier for the transaction triggered by the request"
              }
            },
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "id": {
                      "description": "The ID of the trip.",
                      "type": "string",
                      "example": "12345"
                    },
                    "tripEndTimestamp": {
                      "description": "Time when trip has concluded. Timestamp will be formatted as RFC3339.\n",
                      "type": "string",
                      "example": "2020-08-31T16:10:01Z"
                    },
                    "tripType": {
                      "description": "The type of trip:\n* `shortTerm`\n",
                      "type": "string",
                      "example": "shortTerm"
                    },
                    "vehicleType": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "enum": [
                        "electric",
                        "hybrid",
                        "gas",
                        "fuel"
                      ],
                      "description": "The type of the vehicle.",
                      "example": "hybrid"
                    },
                    "mileage_km": {
                      "description": "The mileage of the trip in km.",
                      "type": "integer",
                      "example": 100
                    },
                    "startMileage_km": {
                      "description": "The mileage reading of the vehicle at the start of the trip in km.",
                      "type": "integer",
                      "example": 100
                    },
                    "overallMileage_km": {
                      "description": "Overall mileage reading of the vehicle in km.",
                      "type": "integer",
                      "example": 100
                    },
                    "travelTime": {
                      "description": "Duration of the trip in minutes.",
                      "type": "integer",
                      "example": 58
                    },
                    "averageFuelConsumption": {
                      "nullable": true,
                      "description": "Average fuel consumption during the trip.",
                      "type": "number",
                      "example": 12.8
                    },
                    "averageElectricConsumption": {
                      "nullable": true,
                      "description": "Average battery consumption during the trip (calculated as electric overall consumption - averageAuxConsumption - averageRecuperation; can be negative)",

                      "example": 6.9
                    },
                    "averageAuxConsumption": {
                      "nullable": true,
                      "description": "Average auxiliary consumption during the trip. (Can be negative)",
                      "type": "number",
                      "example": 6.9
                    },
                    "averageRecuperation": {
                      "nullable": true,
                      "description": "Average recuperation during the trip. (Can be negative)",
                      "type": "number",
                      "example": 6.9
                    },
                    "averageGasConsumption": {
                      "nullable": true,
                      "description": "Average gas consumption during the trip.",
                      "type": "number",
                      "example": 42
                    },
                    "averageSpeed_kmph": {
                      "description": "Average speed during the trip in kmph.",
                      "type": "integer",
                      "example": 99
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          },

        ],

          },

          }
        ],
        "responses": {

              }
            },

              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "properties": {
                    "data": {
                      "type": "array",
                      "items": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "properties": {
                          "id": {
                            "description": "The ID of the trip.",
                            "type": "string",
                            "example": "12345"
                          },
                          "tripEndTimestamp": {
                            "description": "Time when trip has concluded. Timestamp will be formatted as RFC3339.\n",
                            "type": "string",
                            "example": "2020-08-31T16:10:01Z"
                          },
                          "tripType": {
                            "description": "The type of trip:\n* `shortTerm`\n",
                            "type": "string",
                            "example": "shortTerm"
                          },
                          "vehicleType": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "enum": [
                              "electric",
                              "hybrid",
                              "gas",
                              "fuel"
                            ],
                            "description": "The type of the vehicle.",
                            "example": "hybrid"
                          },
                          "mileage_km": {
                            "description": "The mileage of the trip in km.",
                            "type": "integer",
                            "example": 100
                          },
                          "startMileage_km": {
                            "description": "The mileage reading of the vehicle at the start of the trip in km.",
                            "type": "integer",
                            "example": 100
                          },
                          "overallMileage_km": {
                            "description": "Overall mileage reading of the vehicle in km.",
                            "type": "integer",
                            "example": 100
                          },
                          "travelTime": {
                            "description": "Duration of the trip in minutes.",
                            "type": "integer",
                            "example": 58
                          },
                          "averageFuelConsumption": {
                            "nullable": true,
                            "description": "Average fuel consumption during the trip.",
                            "type": "number",
                            "example": 12.8
                          },
                          "averageElectricConsumption": {
                            "nullable": true,
                            "description": "Average battery consumption during the trip (calculated as electric overall consumption - averageAuxConsumption - averageRecuperation; can be negative)",
                            "type": "number",
                            "example": 6.9
                          },
                          "averageAuxConsumption": {
                            "nullable": true,
                            "description": "Average auxiliary consumption during the trip. (Can be negative)",
                            "type": "number",
                            "example": 6.9
                          },
                          "averageRecuperation": {
                            "nullable": true,
                            "description": "Average recuperation during the trip. (Can be negative)",
                            "type": "number",
                            "example": 6.9
                          },
                          "averageGasConsumption": {
                            "nullable": true,
                            "description": "Average gas consumption during the trip.",
                            "type": "number",
                            "example": 42
                          },

                            "description": "Average speed during the trip in kmph.",

        ],

              "type": "string",

            },
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "query",
            "name": "from",

              "type": "string",
              "example": "2020-09-01T00:00:00Z"
            },
            "required": false
          },
          {
            "in": "query",

            "description": "End of time span",

              "type": "string",
              "example": "2020-09-01T23:59:59Z"
            },
            "required": false
          }
        ],
        "responses": {

            "description": "The saved trips of a car",

              "VCF-Trace-ID": {

                  "type": "string"

              }
            },
            "content": {
              "application/json;version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "properties": {
                    "data": {
                      "type": "array",
                      "items": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "properties": {
                          "id": {
                            "description": "The ID of the trip.",
                            "type": "string",
                            "example": "12345"
                          },
                          "tripEndTimestamp": {
                            "description": "Time when trip has concluded. Timestamp will be formatted as RFC3339.\n",
                            "type": "string",
                            "example": "2020-08-31T16:10:01Z"
                          },
                          "tripType": {
                            "description": "The type of trip:\n* `longTerm`\n",
                            "type": "string",
                            "example": "longTerm"
                          },
                          "vehicleType": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "enum": [
                              "electric",
                              "hybrid",
                              "gas",
                              "fuel"
                            ],
                            "description": "The type of the vehicle.",
                            "example": "hybrid"
                          },
                          "mileage_km": {
                            "description": "The mileage of the trip in km.",
                            "type": "integer",
                            "example": 100
                          },
                          "startMileage_km": {
                            "description": "The mileage reading of the vehicle at the start of the trip in km.",
                            "type": "integer",
                            "example": 100
                          },
                          "overallMileage_km": {
                            "description": "Overall mileage reading of the vehicle in km.",
                            "type": "integer",
                            "example": 100
                          },
                          "travelTime": {
                            "description": "Duration of the trip in minutes.",
                            "type": "integer",
                            "example": 58
                          },
                          "averageFuelConsumption": {
                            "nullable": true,
                            "description": "Average fuel consumption during the trip.",
                            "type": "number",
                            "example": 12.8
                          },
                          "averageElectricConsumption": {
                            "nullable": true,
                            "description": "Average battery consumption during the trip (calculated as electric overall consumption - averageAuxConsumption - averageRecuperation; can be negative)",
                            "type": "number",
                            "example": 6.9
                          },
                          "averageAuxConsumption": {
                            "nullable": true,
                            "description": "Average auxiliary consumption during the trip. (Can be negative)",
                            "type": "number",
                            "example": 6.9
                          },
                          "averageRecuperation": {
                            "nullable": true,
                            "description": "Average recuperation during the trip. (Can be negative)",
                            "type": "number",
                            "example": 6.9
                          },
                          "averageGasConsumption": {
                            "nullable": true,
                            "description": "Average gas consumption during the trip.",
                            "type": "number",
                            "example": 4.2
                          },
                          "averageSpeed_kmph": {
                            "description": "Average speed during the trip in kmph.",
                            "type": "integer",
                            "example": 99
                          }

                      "description": "The type of trip:\n* `cyclic`\n",
                      "type": "string",
                      "example": "cyclic"
                    },

                      "type": "string",
                      "enum": [
                        "electric",

                        "gas",
                        "fuel"
                      ],
                      "description": "The type of the vehicle.",
                      "example": "hybrid"
                    },
                    "mileage_km": {
                      "description": "The mileage of the trip in km.",
                      "type": "integer",
                      "example": 100
                    },
                    "startMileage_km": {
                      "description": "The mileage reading of the vehicle at the start of the trip in km.",
                      "type": "integer",
                      "example": 100
                    },
                    "overallMileage_km": {
                      "description": "Overall mileage reading of the vehicle in km.",
                      "type": "integer",
                      "example": 100

                      "description": "Duration of the trip in minutes.",
                      "type": "integer",
                      "example": 58
                    },

                      "nullable": true,

                      "type": "number",
                      "example": 12.8

                      "nullable": true,

                      "example": 6.9

      "get": {
        "summary": "Warning Lights Settings",
        "security": [
          {
            "IdentityKitToken": []
          },
          {
            "CommercialIdentityKitToken": []
          }
        ],
        "description": "Returns the current warning light settings on a given VIN. It requires the capability `vehicleHealthSettings` to be available and enabled, the consented scope `warning_lights`.\nOnly available for MOD1-2 vehicles with VHR1.\n",
        "operationId": "getWarningLightsSettings",
        "tags": [
          "Vehicle Health"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "required": true,
            "description": "The vin of the car",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Current Warning Lights Settings",
            "headers": {
              "VCF-Trace-ID": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "string"
                },
                "description": "Identifier for the transaction triggered by the request"
              }
            },
            "content": {
              "application/json; version=1": {
                "schema": {
                  "required": [
                    "data"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "data": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "properties": {
                        "timeBasedSupported": {
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "description": "Are time based settings currently supported",
                          "example": true
                        },
                        "timeBased": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "properties": {
                            "collectionPeriod": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "It can only be set to 'none' or 'monthly'. When the value is set to 'none', the time based creation of reports is disabled.",
                              "example": "monthly"
                            },
                            "dayOfMonth": {
                              "type": "integer",
                              "description": "Day of the month in which warning lights should be collected",
                              "example": 11
                            },
                            "monthsBetweenReports": {
                              "type": "integer",
                              "description": "Months between reports. (For example, if the value is set to '2', a report is generated every 2 months)",
                              "example": 1
                            },
                            "hour": {
                              "type": "integer",
                              "description": "Hour at which warning lights should be collected",
                              "example": 0
                            },
                            "minute": {
                              "type": "integer",
                              "description": "Minute at which warning lights should be collected",
                              "example": 0
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "distanceBasedSupported": {
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "description": "Are distance based settings currently supported",
                          "example": true
                        },
                        "distanceBased": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "properties": {
                            "distance_km": {
                              "type": "integer",
                              "description": "The interval in which the reports are to be created ",
                              "example": 1000
                            },
                            "start_km": {
                              "type": "integer",
                              "description": "The minimal distance for the initial creation of a report",
                              "example": 1000
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "maintenanceBasedSupported": {
                          "type": "boolean",
                          "description": "Are maintenance based settings currently supported",
                          "example": true
                        },
                        "maintenanceBased": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "properties": {
                            "distance_km": {
                              "type": "integer",

        "summary": "Warning Lights Settings",
        "security": [
          {
            "IdentityKitToken": []

          {
            "CommercialIdentityKitToken": []
          }
        ],
        "description": "Sets the current warning light settings on a given VIN. It requires the capability `vehicleHealthSettings` to be available and enabled, the consented scope `warning_lights`.\nOnly available for MOD1-2 vehicles with VHR1.\n",
        "operationId": "setWarningLightsSettings",
        "tags": [
          "Vehicle Health"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "vin",
            "in": "path",
            "required": true,
            "description": "The vin of the car",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          },
          {
            "in": "header",
            "name": "User-ID",
            "description": "IdentityKit userID. Not required if using CommercialIdentityKit token.",
            "schema": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uuid"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "requestBody": {
          "required": true,
          "content": {
            "application/json;version=1": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                  "timeBased": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "properties": {
                      "collectionPeriod": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "It can only be set to 'none' or 'monthly'. When the value is set to 'none', the time based creation of reports is disabled.",
                        "example": "monthly"
                      },
                      "dayOfMonth": {
                        "type": "integer",
                        "description": "Day of the month in which warning lights should be collected. Defaults to 0.",
                        "example": 11
                      },
                      "monthsBetweenReports": {
                        "type": "integer",
                        "description": "Months between reports. (For example, if the value is set to '2', a report is generated every 2 months). Defaults to 0.",
                        "example": 1
                      },
                      "hour": {
                        "type": "integer",
                        "description": "Hour at which warning lights should be collected. Defaults to 0.",
                        "example": 0
                      },
                      "minute": {
                        "type": "integer",
                        "description": "Minute at which warning lights should be collected. Defaults to 0.",
                        "example": 0
                      }
                    }
                  },
                  "distanceBased": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "properties": {
                      "distance_km": {
                        "type": "integer",
                        "description": "The interval in which the reports are to be created. Defaults to 0.",
                        "example": 1000

                        "type": "integer",

                        "type": "integer",
